reviewText:
This seamless sports bra fits well according to the sizing chart reference. I do yoga and Pop Pilates and this bra is very comfortable to wear while providing support. The wide straps don't dig into my skin and I haven't had issues with chafing. The bra is made from 90% nylon and 10% spandex. The bras material is very soft, lightweight and breathable. The front of the bra includes padding inserts that can be easily removed through large pockets before washing or replacement. The ribbed bottom band works well to prevent shifting or bunching up. Overall, I love how soft and comfortable the bra is while providing good coverage and support.

If you are buying this for yourself you will feel pampered by the presentation.  If you are buying this as a gift, the presentation will absolutely let the person you are giving it to know that you care.  This hat is very beautifully done and anyone would be thrilled to own it.  I was very impressed with the sturdiness of it as a lot of hats like this tend to flop or not hold their form as well.  This one seems like it will hold its form very well.  I would highly recommend this hat.  It has good coverage and is very nicely and well made.  I personally have a few people I know currently fighting the battle against cancer and have lost a few friends and family members in the last 10 years.  I purchased these hats to gift to my friends who are Fighting Like a Girl!  Hopefully this will make them feel special and proud to wear this no matter where they go!

reviewText: Cute fit and washes well.

Quality: Excellent
Value: Excellent
Pros: Comfortable, fun
Cons: Hard to think of any....except maybe the Croc haters out there!

Some people think Crocs are stupid or ugly or both. Crocs are popular in our household, though. We wear them all the time, in different colors and styles. It is more and more common to see athletes, particularly ones in high school, wearing Crocs in place of after-sport sandals (slides). I also know someone who wore them to the prom with a fairly formal dress. They're just fun and comfortable. They're a good substitute for sandals because you immediately eliminate the danger of stubbing your toes! Crocbands are a definite upgrade as far as comfort and style go.  They offer a little more support and have holes on the top but not the sides, which really cuts down on getting those little annoying pebbles in your shoes. The band around the bottom makes them look a little more like sneakers. Ordered these in Aquamarine, and they really look sharp. The price was very reasonable, less than half the cost they were in the store that sells Crocs at the mall.

If you believe Crocs are making a comeback or never even went out of style, these will be a cool addition to your footwear collection. They're great for running errands, going out to the garden or mailbox, something comfortable to wear after playing a sport, wearing to work or school, going to the prom, etc. etc. You are only limited by your own Croc boundaries!

I really like to wear scarves, especially to work. I think they are a great alternative to jewelry and a good way to spruce up an outfit. I was given the opportunity to purchase the Silver Lilly Womens Anchor Print Scarf at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review and was thrilled. Nautical prints are really on trend right now and with it being summer a sheer scarf is perfect. I order the scarf in grey with white anchors. It is an infinity style scarf which means that it is sewn together in an O shape. A single stitch was used to hem the edges as well as sew the ends together. The fabric is soft and more of a matte sheer which I like. Its light enough to wear in the summer, but has a look that is appropriate for the winter months as well. The scarf easily loops around my neck twice and still has plenty of room to drape. It is over 30 wide so it has good volume to it once on. Overall I am really pleased with this scarf. It is made of quality material and has an on trend design with a nice neutral color palette.
summary: Quality scarf with a trendy design!

reviewText: I loved my 2 year old's version of this hat so much I decided to order one for myself in an adult size. The brim was a little more bulky than I was expecting, but other than that it seems like a great hat. I use it for gardening and it is great at keeping the sun off the back of my neck and keeps the top of my head from getting too hot. I have dark hair and live in a hot sunny part of the country so hats are essential. I like that this one has a chin strap - we also get a lot of wind. It is really annoying to have to chase your hat after it blows off so this eliminates that problem. I also have another hat of the same brand but a different style. They really make nice hats, well thought out and have good sun protection with the UPF 50. The size is adjustable which is great for me. I have a big head so many of the "one size fits all" hats are too tight. Not this one!

Because they're currently not posted anywhere on this page, I'll start by listing the dimensions of this shirt.

Note: These are the dimensions of the "L/US S" size

 Collar/Neck = 15.75in (40cm)
 Shoulders = 17in (43cm)
 Chest = 20in (51cm)
 Sleeves [from shoulder to cuff] = 24.75in (63cm)
 Sleeves [from neck to cuff] = 33.5in (85cm)
 Total Length = 27.75in (70.5cm)
 Fit: Slim

Now onto my review:

My first impression of the shirt: it stinks! And I do mean that literally. If you've ever had any clothes shipped to you from China or South Korea, you know what I'm talking about. The clothes often has a very "fishy", grimy, metallic odor when it's fresh out of the package, so the first thing I did after receiving this was put it through a wash (I hang my clothes to dry, though, so I can't say whether or not this would shrink in the dryer).

I bought the Light Blue version of this shirt and in reality the shirt is actually much lighter than shown in the product photo (see my own pics, if they're visible).

As the title of my review states, this is actually a pretty nice shirt - fits exceptionally well and is cut slim - although it does betray its lower pricetag in a few ways:

- First, the fabric isn't the greatest. That's not to say it's bad, it just isn't "silk" or something fancy like that. It's lightweight but not too thin, however it seems to wrinkle easily, and, like I said, the first thing I did was wash this so I doubt it's starch that's making it hold its creases so much. The wrinkling isn't horrible, just noticeable.

- Second: loose strings...goodness there's SOOOO many of them! This can't be such a big complaint though, because, let's be serious, a pair of scissors can easily do away with these.

- But I think that the biggest giveaway that this isn't a high-end garment is the grid-pattern print. The blurry photos had me thinking the grid pattern was woven into the cloth, but nope, it's printed. That wouldn't be so bad if they were tiny zig-zagged lines, however they're dots. And to me the dots are too big; I think just a tiny bit smaller and they would have looked better. Also, I was hoping they would be Navy, (which would look great on a Light Blue shirt) but I was wrong again; they're black. I'm pretty sure the dots are black on all three shirts.

And lastly, a couple other things of relevance:
- The shirt has a stiff collar instead of collar stays.
- The buttons aren't flat against the shirt; they're sort of like tiny hot irons which hang off the shirt from the handle (see photos). Also, they're shiny and metallic, but are actually made of plastic.

I almost wanna give this shirt 3 stars (the grid pattern really drags it down), but overall it's pretty nice for the price.

reviewText: Perfect fit; Coke Bottle.

My measurements are as follows: 32 inch underbust, 29.5 inch waist, 38 inch high hips, 10 inch torso length from under breast to lap. I'm 5'2" and it is a little long and cuts into my lap a bit when I'm sitting but helps my posture.
This is a decent faja, especially at this price. However, I would say that it runs large and it's not real latex. I bought the "9 steel bones in black" one and it's made of neoprene. This will also make you sweat, but it advertises itself as latex so it is a bit of false advertising. However, you might prefer the neoprene if you have a latex allergy.

I have an actual squeem faja and I'll include photos comparing the two. The squeem is shorter so it's better for shorter torsos, and it's actual latex. The squeem I have is in a size small. I ordered this one in a medium based off my measurements (I even ordered down) and it was still big on me. I also have am very squishable and have more adipose fat on my torso so I can squish down more than someone who is all muscle. That being said, this faja doesn't squish in so much as all around the body. It is very strong though and I like the multiple front adjustments and the neoprene makes you sweat a lot under it. It also has more bones in it than the squeem so I think it helps with your posture more.
My main takeaways are that it isn't latex when it states it's latex, but it's great for long torsos and does help with posture.
summary: Good for posture and long torsos--neoprene and NOT latex

reviewText: At this price point, I don't think I could've received a better deal. In short, these ties are reasonably lengthened to use various styled knots. BMC Stylish 3pc Mixed Pattern Mens Fashion Knitted Neck Tie Accessory Set - Funky Phresh The fabric is very soft which consequently makes it easier to tie and hold knots. Upon the first time I tried the red one, I knew it was a great tie. Usually I'd wear the classic polyester, or silk fabricated imitates, but these give the color they come with a rich and fuller depth, especially if you know how to combine it well. I've only had the chance to wear two of the three ties of the bundle I ordered, but I'm sure the third tie is just as good as the first two I got to wear. Given that they're knit ties, they're suitable for more casual atires, however, with the right selection in your wardrobe, you can dress these up no sweat. The bundle that I got was the gentleman's Word, I like this one especially because it utilizes colors that can be switched and matched with different colored shirts and suits, while keeping the colors muted. Overall, these are very well made ties. If you're just getting into knit ties, or just ties in general, I would greatly recommend starting with one of these trios. Great ties at a great price. Sample provided at a reduced or free price in exchange for an honest evaluation.
summary: Perfect bundle to introduce oneself to knit ties. Holds various knots, and well lengthened for them as well. Fabric is soft.

reviewText:
These are unusual ties, but nice in a casual way.  I could see them working for young men or college students who want to look cheeky-hip.  Personally, I hope I can pull this look off, but I am willing to try anyway.  If you prefer to dress conservative, then these are probably not for you.

For the positives, the ties are a good price and rather unique.  They look unusual but good in a casual way.  If you cannot tell from the picture, let me make it clear: these ties are square!  I had never seen ties like this before, but I was intrigued and am not disappointed with the ties or their list price.

I could not find the material of the ties, but it is not silk, the usual tie material, as far as I know.  That's okay, and was what I was expecting.  It just goes into making these more of a casual-wear kind of thing.  An added bonus about the less expensive material (besides the lower price) is that I will have no qualms washing these things.  I expect them to be machine washable, too.

Disclaimer: I requested to receive and did receive these ties free or at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.
summary: Unusual but Nice for Casual/Eclectic Wear

I got these ties for my husband and teenager to wear. My husband has to wear a tie to work everyday, but I don't think that these ties are great for work. They are perfect for everyday use and even a night out. I love the fun designs and knit patterns.
The stitching is nice and they seem as though they will hold up for many years. I do wish that we could choose the colors and mix and match combinations, because I didn't really like the light colored tie in this set.

These ties are super nice! Honestly, the best part about this purchase is the price. Three knitted ties for $16.50 is an absolute steal. I got the weekend with her parents combo set, and I have to say that I am very very pleased. Just know that for this particular set, one of the ties has a standard triangular end, while the other two are the flat ones that are more commonly found for knitted ties. They are of a much better quality than I had expected. The design is very nice, and the width of the tie is just perfect. No one wears wide ties anymore, especially if they're knitted. Actually, I don't think I have ever even seen a wide knitted tie. If there is any flaw in this product, it would be that you cant customize your own set of three ties. Honestly, Im not a huge fan of the light/beige colored one in this weekend with her parents combo set. The other two look great. If they gave us the option to choose our own three, that would have been the cherry on top. But for this price, I am not complaining. I highly recommend this product to anyone in need of some nice but cheap ties. I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

I have bought Bundle Monster items before so I was so excited when I saw this set. My husband has more silk ties than any one man should but he was really looking to broaden his more casual knit tie collection since silk ties are so much more formal. There are so many great options to choose from it would be quite easy to find a set to fit anyone's personality. They work great with a more casual broadcloth shirt or you can wear them with a more formal shirt as well. They are plenty long for my 6'9" husband, tie easily with a variety of knots, and have a flat end for a little different look. The colors are bright and patterns attractive. Our others have held up very well and I expect these will be no different. I highly recommend this set of ties as a great addition to any man's wardrobe. reviewText: I came across these really neat ties for my brother who must wear one to work occasionally so I decided to buy them.  I was impressed at the selection they had to choose from, a wide variety.  I bought the set Waldos Favorite.  They came on the delivery date packaged with each one individually wrapped and then put in a ziploc sort of bag.  There was no damage to any of these.  These look and feel like a high quality tie.  They seem very durable, there are no snags, looses ends, or loose stitching that seems to be coming off.  The ties are also made with a thick fabric, yet easy enough to tie for desired look.  There is a strip of fabric on the back to place the end of the tie into, this seems to be attached very securely.  This selection can be casual or dressed up. I was highly impressed by the look of these as soon as I took them out.  The red is a nice dark color, perfect for winter wear, the gray one is great for any time of the year, and the turquoise and white one is a fun pattern that can be worn any time as well.  My brother really likes this selection and they make quite an impression.  For the normal price, you really can not beat the quality you receive in return. Super durable, and super versatile, I highly suggest grabbing some for yourself or one pack for the favorite man in your life.  Enjoy in style!

Amazing buy! The quality is fantastic, and each tie has a nice shine which let's it pop out nicely. Getting three for this price is an absolute steal. Some ties have a hint of gasoline, but not too noticeable. Going to buy a few more to add to my collection!!

The silk backing makes it very easy to tie a beautiful Windsor knot . Lays nicely upon being tied. Colors and manufactor way makes the light shine off in a beautiful but not obtrusive way. Love them great for gifts great for women to for business attire. Best buy for price, style, and fashion. A tall man can use them as well and not look as if he put on a child's tie. Must have.
summary: Neck tie in time for fathers day

reviewText:
Did not think I would like such an inexpensive tie as I do in fact like this one. A solid knit that does not stretch out, holds the knot well, is slender enough for a reasonably small body type like mine, and a good length. What's not to like?

The construction is very very good and it seems like it is going to last a long time. The packaging the tie came in was very nice as well and make it seem like a decent brand of ties. The only comment I have is that I am a decently tall person (5'7") and it feels like the tie is a little short for me as Im accustomed to the double windsor knot. It seems like that knot is too much for this length and had to go to a single knot assembly. Just a quick comment but otherwise the tie looks very sharp and is well made.

Was not expecting these ties to look as nice as it is. Also I was not expecting it to be as well made such as having a bit of a lining where it wraps around the back of your neck. It also has a "tie stay" to keep the ends together.. I expect to wear this to more formal events yet it definitely allows me to show off some style and personalization to my outfit.

I received this item at a discounted price for a fair and unbiased review. I was not otherwise compensated. Additionally, I do take these reviews seriously. I do take into consideration price at the time of the review and if I think something is overpriced I do dock them for that, or note it where necessary. If a product is BAD, I do not hesitate to give it 1 star.

This is one of the best shoe bags you can get.  Shipping from GolfbaseUK was faster than expected for both purchases I made (bought two the first time, and a single the second time)  This is a much better shoe bag than the PumaGolf shoe bag available to US retailers.  I have purchased two of those ( https://www.amazon.com/Puma-Golf-Shoe-Black-Size/dp/B01BGKKOJO/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1501668854&sr=8-1&keywords=puma+shoe+bag ) and this shoe bag is much sturdier.  While the other bag offered from puma is nice, it is almost like they tried to make to much out of it. This bag is sturdy, holds its shape, and can be stacked on a shelf with others.  I have a larger than the average guy golf shoe collection, and in my garage I have one of the shelf cabinets you can purchase at Lowe's or Home Depot.  I have 7 pairs of golf shoes that are in rotation, depending on weather I am walking or riding, and depending on dry or wet conditions, and lets face it, depending on color.  I have four of an older style of Ping Golf shoe bag that is no longer available, and this is the only comparable bag I could find in a brand I am willing to buy. For the money, this bag can't be beat.  On a side note, the other shoe bag listed, once you remove the velcro shoe divider, makes a great small bag to put my rain gear in..  I was able to fit, my rain pants, jacket, short sleeve rain shirt, gloves and a waterproof bucket hat.
summary: Best buy, worth the 2 week or so wait for shipping from across the pond, especially from a great seller

reviewText:
I've been using an S-Carabiner (#3) for years for my keys. It's been a great way to keep them attached to my pants loop or anything else with a hook. I saw this clip and thought maybe it was time to try out a new product with a bottle opener. Afterall, why carry two items (clip + bottle opener) when you can combine them? The less things rattling the better.

The first mistake I made was not looking at the size closely enough. I've attached a picture to help scale this thing up a bit better for others that find this product. The actual key loop is the same size as a standard #3. But the other loop, is where you run into issues. It's too small and oddly shaped, making it pretty difficult to clip to a belt loop or anything wider than a quarter inch.

It's a sturdy clip and I have no doubt it would last awhile. The bottle opener works just fine and it has no issues keeping keys on the clip. But it's simply the wrong size to be of use to me. I feel on the border of a 3 or 4 star rating, considering I have decided to abandon it after a few months of use I suppose 3 stars is adequate. Waste of money for me, hopefully whomever I pass it on to finds it more useful.
So far So good we will see how it holds up

reviewText: This is a nice bag overall, but not quite up to the quality and finish of my Floto and other bags. I bought a Wilson's black rivet bag in distressed black leather with a sale code on their own website for $50 less and ended up with a nicer bag. My Floto Venezia, on the other hand, cost around $40 more than the Baigio but was of noticeably finer quality. Well worth the extra money. Nevertheless, my daughter saw the bag and fell for it, so I ended up not returning it. Here's the difference. The hardware is smaller and not of the same caliber as I'd expect at this price point. Second, the rivets are not gusseted, nor is the handle attached to a strap that runs down to the bottom. Time will tell if this leads to strap failure. Not a problem on other bags I've seen for less. The leather is a nicely colored reddish brown but has a slightly more "painted" look than my other reddish brown bags where more leather grain shines through. The Baigio arrived crushed to conserve packaging space. Even my Rustic Town Travel duffel at $139 arrived packed with filler to avoid creasing. As a result, the Baigio had deep creases. When the bag is less than maximally filled, the result is that some deep grooves spoil what should be a beautiful look and shape. Not quite cracks, but deep enough to think there may have been a defect. The bag should have been finished and dried and kept in shape with filler, then placed in a fleece bag like my Floto Venezia ($191), Rustic Town Distressed Brown Duffel ($139), and Leathario Duffel ($198 and a much bigger and nicer bag). Each had arrived in style, packed very nicely and in their own cloth bag to avoid marring. Alas, although the Baigio is not a bad bag, at this price point, it falls short on a number of key points. Simply put, does it hold clothes? Yes. Is it nicely lined. Yes, but not quite up to snuff. Does it look good? Yes, but not like its competitors. Will it last. Not sure without the reinforcements, gusseting or full length support straps.
summary: Not bad looking, but falls short compared to others in its price range.

This watch has its good and bad points. Overall, it is definitely well worth the few dollars you'll pay for it. It keeps great time, and isn't that really the main function you want in a watch? If not, and looks is your main function, this watch surprisingly delivers there, too. From any distance, this watch could easily be mistaken for an actual expensive name-brand piece. It's a Chinese made watch, made with a quality Japanese Miyota movement. One thing I don't like is the uni-directional bezel. It's chrome-plated plastic (or at least, it feels and looks like it), only has 60-clicks, and worst of all, it is very loose. Once set, it reverse rotates a lot before being caught by the cog. It is loose, compared to any other rotating bezel I've owned or seen. The band is rolled flat steel. It has three adjuster holes (nice!) and a dual side-button release clasp. Nothing great, but certainly not a bad band. Better than most Chinese metal watch bands, that's for sure. It's even better than some metal bands I've seen on brands such as Fossil and Diesel. Luminous dial hands. The back states, "Water Resistant," but does not show a rating. A little research shows 30m, but with a pop-on case back, I certainly wouldn't risk this watch in any water situation beyond light rain. For an inexpensive watch, this one is definitely higher quality than most Chinese-made pieces. It's heavier, thus feels a bit tougher, has a better band than most, has working day and date, and looks great. Just don't mistake this for a Seiko or a Citizen. It's not near that caliber of quality. But, for the price, you're definitley getting your money's worth.
summary: Worth the money. Higher quality than most Chinese-made watches. Day date feature. Good metal band.

reviewText:
Totally baffled by the great reviews on this product. I purchased two suits, one for my 2 year old son and one for my 8 month old daughter.  While I was hesitant about the high price tag, like many people, I am happy to pay for high quality, especially when it comes to my kids.

We recently used the swim suits for the first time. They were worn for about 45 minutes as our children played in a small splash pad in our front yard. Our son was standing up the whole time as we held our baby.  Both were wearing cloth reusable swim diapers underneath.  Upon taking the suits off I was highly disappointed to see that both suits looked visibly damaged/worn. The fabric looks very snagged, pilled, and in horrible condition.

Per the company who makes them, the "silky" fabric does damage easily if it comes into contact with any rough surfaces, and they are looking into finding a resolution to this issue.  Our suits did not have any contact with anything rough, were worn for less than one hour, and were still in terrible shape.

Not sure if this is the case, but I know some companies can slap a "made in USA" tag on an item even if 99% of it is made overseas. Kinda a dirty trick, but it definitely happens. Not sure if that is what is going on in this instance, but this product absolutely did not impress us. Atleast if it had been made in a different country and was of this quality, hopefully it would have cost a lot less.

Luckily Amazon is willing to give us our money back even though I discarded the original packaging/ tags as I initially had no intention of returning them. Had I written my review before actually using them, it likely would have been 5 stars.  We loved the fit and coverage that these suits provide. The fabric issue is a deal breaker. Anything involving kids just has to be made more durable. If not, it definitely has to cost significantly less than this product.

Hope this info is helpful to other potential customers.

Attached is a picture for reference.
summary: Not worth the hefty price tag

reviewText:
I normally wear a size 3/5 in jeans.  I purchased these in a size 5. The jeans fit very snug so I actually wish I would have gone up a size.  In my opinion the jeans are cut more like a "jeggings" or "slim" fit rather than a "boyfriend" fit.  Nevertheless, they are a very soft, stretchy and are a popular in-style look.  I am certain I will wear them but will more than likely pair them up with a long shirt.  Actually, I just might order the lighter wash color too - just up the size.

UPDATE:  Ordered and received these jeans in the lighter wash in a size 7.  I REALLY LOVE THESE JEANS.  They are so soft, have great stretch and are extremely comfortable in both sizes.  I would recommend your normal jean size if you like the jeggings fit and a size up if you prefer a loser boyfriend fit.

reviewText:
I love it! Given the opportunity to purchase the Aiyaya 18k Black Glod Plated Aquamarine Sapphire AAA+Cubic Zirconia Rings For Women, I took it.  When I saw the picture of it, I fell in love with it.  Blue is my favorite color. I was worried that it would be too big or bulky, but when I put it on and wore it around the house, I found that my fears were warrantless.
First of all, the ring comes in a small red cloth bag. The band looks antique with some intricate detailing. The stones are firmly placed in the settings and are beautiful.  Aiyaya & CO offers a full-3Year warranty covering manufacturing and material defects which supports how well made this ring is.
Second, the ring is not too heavy or bulky for me.  I have been able to wear it around the house without banging it on anything.  Matter of fact, I am typing while wearing it. I ordered a size 7 and it is a perfect fit. There is no sliding or slipping.
This ring is really gorgeous.  I am so glad that I was able to order it.  I definitely recommend it.  Buy it; you will not regret it.

reviewText: Wore them today.  Like the look
Beautiful!
Love how soft and comfortable they are. I can seriously sleep in them.

For a bony woman who is 5'3, 100lb, with a 32B cup size, these bras were not a good fit. They were too tight around my rib cage, but the straps were too far apart and falling off my shoulders. And when I would pull the flap down to reveal my boob for breastfeeding the material covered up my nipple; makes for a pretty pointless nursing bra.

I love these! I am 5'2" and was about 115-120 lbs. post-baby and the size small fit great. What I love about these is that the elastic under the boobs is TIGHT so there is very good support. I'm done nursing and still wear these some days lol!!

I am still pregnant and haven't started nursing yet. But I really like the support of these bras. As some people described, the shoulder straps are set wide, but I haven't had any problems keeping them on my shoulders. People also said they ran small and I agree.

I usually wear a 32 C or D in VS. In blouses im usually a 4-6 or xs-small. I have a rather small back and ribcage, with most bras being too loose around the band. So I ordered the small size of these bras because they say to order same size as pre pregnancy. And I figured since since I sometimes wear xs, a small was already a size up in theory.

I'd say the ribcage fits well and can even be loosened a row.  The cups are very streachy and first trimester they fit pretty well and helped reduce tenderness. They were so much more comfortable than my old underwires. Now I'm 6 months peegnant and the cups are decidedly too small, even with the insert removed. I'm not quite sure what cup size I am currently, but I'm thinking I'm well over DDD. I think perhaps 6 months post partum, these will fit again.
I'm going to get these in a medium because I liked the smalls so much. I'm very interested in ordering the breast feeding cami made by this company. Hope this helps others with sizing, I'd suggest most people order a size larger than usual.
summary: Great quality, comfy, a bit small!

reviewText: I really enjoy wearing these. They fit great, like a sports bra. They come with some major cup padding and I found it difficult to nurse with the pads still inside. They don't lay down flat and gets in baby's way of eating. So, I just removed them.

Better quality than expected and comfortable. However, the straps are positioned very wide on the bra so they slide down very easily on the shoulder. Could be my petite frame. Would like this better in a racerback so the straps would stay put.
Although it is a bit snug these are sooooo comfortable. They are suportive for everyday wear. I need more of them!

reviewText: Love this purse! Has lots of pockets and lots of room!
I love it. Not what I expected but I love it.  Very roomy. Might buy another one in the future.

This bag has everything that matters to me in a purse: (1) good size and shape, and lots of pockets; (2) light weight; (3) a  wide enough base and stiff enough fabric that the bag "stands up" on its own and doesn't fall over or slump. It is just wide enough to hold a manila folder, another requirement of mine. I didn't realize this bag had a flap, and I don't like flaps, so I removed it (easy to do). It's the zipped section on the front with the round logo. This exposed another zipped, gussetted pocket that now I can access instantly and which holds my wallet perfectly. This gussetted pocket is flush with the bottom of the purse, so it holds a heavy wallet without "tipping" the purse. This is a really smart element of the design. (Despite the price it seems a lot of thought went into designing this bag.)  Looks don't matter to me and it's just as well because this bag is somewhat cheap looking  but hell, it IS cheap ($20). If the stitching starts to come undone (per some reviews), I'll just re-stitch on my sewing machine or by hand as needed. If the zippers start to separate (per some reviews),
that could be a problem. I hope this bag holds up because I really do LOVE the design. I'm ordering another color just because.

reviewText: These are awesome paints. They were used for a glow in the dark teen birthday party and they really worked. They really lit up under the black lights. We used two 24" fluorescent black lights and the kids loved the effect. We had 34 teens at our party and still had lots of paint leftover. The tubes are larger than most. Definitely recommend!!

reviewerName: The Happy Clown With A Frown
reviewText:
I love playing with color! I received a set of these Huuman Blacklight Neon Paint Set to review and they are fun! You get six insanely bright colors in the set. They are super bright even without a black light, but they glow like crazy with one! The paints are a nice consistency that goes on smoothly and dries pretty quickly.
The paints is water soluble. They might run or come off if you get extremely sweaty or wet. Mine was completely dry and came off after a few moments under running water with no soap. It washed clean away and did not stain my skin.
These are fun on skin, but you can also paint a canvas or poster board and create your own glowing art work or black light poster. Great activity for kids! It doesn't take a whole lot to create a nice design. I recommend using a paint palette or a coated paper plate and squeezing out a drop or two of the colors you want to use. That will help you to not waste as much of this cool paint.
I can see this being really fun for Halloween! Paint on a design, streak your hair or make your own mask and carry a black light flashlight to shine onto your design when you want to glow!
These paints are non-toxic, safe for skin, hair, nails, etc. They are eco-friendly and cruelty free. I painted very close to my eyes, which I would have left a little more space if I had been putting it on a child, but it washes away very easily with warm water if you or your little one happen to get it in your eyes.
I am very pleased with the quality of these paints an the glow is phenomenal! If you're looking for something fun, these can be used for many different applications. With these, you'll be ready to light up any party!

Just got my paint set! Couldn't wait to try them out. Easy to apply, goes on smooth! At first, once I started drawing pictures with it, I was unsure if I was using enough paint because of how light it looks going on but no worries once you kick on the blacklight the color REALLY comes to life! Very bright! A lot more so than I thought. Once it's dry if you run your hand over the painted area, you can't feel that it's even on your skin. Has great flexibility. Perfect for kids, festivals/clubs and Halloween fun! Can't wait to play around with this more. Very pleased! I need to grab a stencil kit though!

AMAZING!!!  These are GREAT for arts and crafts that you really want to stand out!  My kiddos used each other as canvasses, using stencils they made from cardboard.  Easy to use and easy to clean up -- warm water does wonders! We did mess up and squeezed out quite a bit to start then realized that a little dab can go a long way, so just be mindful of that -- but of course when you have excited kiddos, there really is not telling what a little dab versus a glob can be.  I received my paints at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: fun, fun, and did I tell you it's fun!!!

reviewText:
Such fun! The Huuman Blacklight Neon Paint Set is so much more than I expected. The acrylic neon paint is fun and easy to put on, stays on quite well for a body paint and washes off extremely well. My grandson and his mom and dad are going on a black light fun run in the fall and this will be perfect for them to all three paint up their bodies and clothes.

There is plenty paint in these bottles for a LOT of painting. Today my grandson came over to "test" the paints. It was a fun summer activity. He used less that 1/4 oz combined in all the colors he used. In fact, if we hadn't removed the paper seals on the inside the lid top of the bottles, you wouldn't know he used any at all. I like that it is non-toxic and that even if he had gotten some in his eye (not recommended) it could have been washed out and it wouldn't have injured him.

I like that I can use it to decorate things around my back yard for a party and it will wash out the next time it rains and won't hurt the grass. I don't have any black lights out there, but the neon paint will show up nicely before dark. Actually, he did get a bit on the fabric of the chair in which he was sitting. No problem, though. I took a wet rag and it came out like it was never there.

The next time he comes over, he wants me to print out some of the stencils that came free as an ebook so he can use them to make some cool designs. That means he will have another fun, fun time at his grandma's.

One other thing, I'm proud that it is made in the US and that it hasn't been tested on any "unwilling participants".

I was fortunate to receive this product at a discount in exchange for my HONEST & UNBIASED opinion. I ALWAYS pretest every product prior to writing a review. I am free to write whatever I believe to be true, whether positive or negative. This is my true story and my honest opinion.
summary: Such fun! The Huuman Blacklight Neon Paint Set is so much more than I expected.

reviewText:
The Huuman Blacklight Neon Paint Set it so much for fun adults and children alike.  It looks fabulous under a blacklight whether on your, your clothes, or anything else you feel comfortable washing when you're done.

The day ours arrived we had company and everyone of every age wanted to play with the paints once the sun went down. Thankfully it washes right off/out because there was a huge mess to clean up once everyone was done.

They come in an easy to squeeze rubber bottle with a flip top lid that helps regulate how much comes out of the bottle. We've actually thoroughly washed out the bottles to reuse in craft projects later on. We're leaving them open for now to ensure we don't trap in any lingering paint smell.

Once you turn on a good quality blacklight - look out! The paint really lights up nice and bright. You can find so many fun uses for these paints.

Note: I obtained my paint set at a discount in exchange for providing an honest and unbiased review.
summary: The Huuman Blacklight Neon Paint Set it so much for fun adults and children alike

reviewText: I bought these to do face painting at my son's party. The kids had a ball seeing their faces painted and then sneaking into the dark bathroom to see the neon colors. reviewText: love it

This is a very simple, very cute skater style dress.  It is made of a highly elastic material, somewhat thin but very comfortable and durable.  I am a pretty average weight but am short and curvy so I can be pretty particular about the way a piece of clothing fits.  Because of the elasticity, I was very comfortable in this dress.  It is a little short but that will be great in the summer, especially when going to the lake or beach!  The zipper right at the breasts is a stylish touch.  The zipper moves up and down nicely.  I wouldn't unzip it too much since that would expose the whole breast area but just a little looks cute.  The stitching is nicely done.  All seams are straight and secure.  The bottom of the dress is not finished, it is a raw edge.  I am not worried that this will create any problems after wearing and washing many times.  The raw edge holds up nicely.  It's cute, comfortable and will help me to stay cool this summer.  There was nothing that I did not like about the dress.  I received this product free of charge in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: This dress would be good for a costume whether for Halloween, a play, a dance, etc. The material is elastic which makes it easy to move in and comfortable to wear. Its not itchy or tight in areas so it doesnt cause chaffing. The downside of this dress though is the material is very very thin, which is why I think it would work best as the uses stated above. I also noticed the hemming is frayed on bottom of the dress, though the stitching feels secure throughout the rest of it. In terms of sizing, I am 58, 180lbs, Dresses Size Large, Shirts Lg/Med, Pants size 10. I ordered a large and this dress fit me well in the chest, arms, and waist. It does not fit me well in the length. My bottom shows with very slight movement. I do have a long torso though - so this might not be the case if you have a shorter torso. Overall, as stated above, this dress is more of a costume piece than one to wear out on the town - thought would make a great accessory to any person who likes to dress up wardrobe. *I received this product at a discounted or free rate in exchange for my unbiased and honest review.
summary: Thin Elastic Dress - Easy to Move In

We have both the clear, the blue, and the Red/White/Blue...all of the colors have the qualities detailed below, but wanted to add that the Red/White/Blue are vibrant in color as pictured. The blue pair is my favorite I think...they match my casual jean style perfectly! We love all of the pairs that we have and the fit on each of them is great. The Red/White/Blue were intended for a grandson whose father is military, but we all would wear them regardless, as they are just an all around great looking and fitting pair of glasses.

I have looked on and off for a pair of sunglasses that met a couple of criteria...fit well without feeling heavy and were quality made without breaking the bank. These met both criteria plus. Let me say right off the bat that I purchased these at a discount (not free!!) in exchange for a fair and honest review. My reviews are always based on the merchandise and not the cost, even when my initial shopping criteria was not overspending. In comparison to other wood sunglasses on the market, these are well worth the full price. They come packaged ready for gift giving too, which to me, is always a bonus. When I opened up the box they arrived in, I found:

-A quality made black hard-shell case for storing the glasses in between uses that zippers shut.
-Rubber wrist bracelet branded with the name Woodies and on the opposite side the American flag
-Woodies-branded microfiber cleaning cloth
-Guitar pick (little bit of an advertising gimmick, but hey, still a nice touch!)

The lenses themselves are great and I can see myself wearing these for both driving and pretty much any outdoor activity.

I'm 5'9" and the dress is really long on me, I can't imagine a shorter girl, she would be lost forever! The rest of the dress actually fit pretty well.  There was a weird slit in the back that seemed a little off. Material was cheap, as expected with the price. Overall, don't buy this.

Nice townie sunglasses.

Pros:
- Good fit
- Polarized
- Sharp vision
- Reduces glare when facing the sun

Cons:
- There is a slight distortion in the lens at a certain angle
- Dark lens. They are fine if its really sunny, but too dark for shade and such.
- Still some glare from sun at certain angles

I recommend these for walking around town. The wood certainly adds some charm. However, these aren't good enough for sport and, with the distortion, may be a concern for driving.

Note: I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

These sunglasses function perfectly fine. However I personally find the quality of the plastic to be a little underwhelming. They are not better than sunglasses at Target or somewhere like that. Although it is not that big of a deal you should also note that since the sides of the glasses are bamboo they are not adjustable like you would have with normal glasses. This can lead to a somewhat uncomfortable fit if you have a head on the larger size. I also found the red to maybe be a little too bright? Kind of a "hot red" if that makes any sense.

HOWEVER. As I said before these will keep the sun out of your eyes and they do look cool! If you are looking for wayfarer style shades with cool wood temples then these should fit your bill!

This product was provided to me at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

reviewText:
When I have plans for after work, and know that Im not going to be able to get home to change, its difficult for me to decide what to wear. I work in a fairly conservative field so finding a dress that is business-like enough for work but that doesnt make me look like I came straight from the office when Im out at night, has been really difficult. Poshsquare has come up with the perfect solution!

I pair this Poshsquare fashion midi-length open-back dress with a light weight shrug and low heels during the day  the modest turtle neck front and midi length offer an elegant and business-appropriate look. After work I take off the shrug and slip on a pair of high boots and Ive got a classy evening look with sexy details. The form fitting top hugs curves and the open back is a delightfully sexy surprise.

The quality of this midi-length dress is apparent in the tight even stitches, the well-finished seams, and the soft flawless material. The dress is exceptionally comfortable and easy to wear with a soft defined waist, no buttons, no zippers, and no fussiness.

I ordered this versatile dress in Navy, size medium, at a promotional cost in exchange for an unbiased review and love the incredible versatility. The length is perfect for me  Im 54 and l love that this dress hits mid-calf. My favorite feature of this dress is how amazingly comfortable it is and how beautifully the skirt drapes. 5 gold stars for a beautiful dress that transitions from work to play perfectly!
summary: Perfect midi-length dress to go from day to night effortlessly! Beautiful color, sexy details, curve loving fit.

reviewText:
This dress looks fabulous on and is perfect for the fall! The collar is not quite turtleneck height (which is fine because I don't like turtlenecks!) but it is a higher neckline than most dresses. I love that it has long sleeves and is that fun "midi" length, which is perfect for work or for a night out. I got the black, which really does a nice job giving me the appearance of a slimmer waistline! It even has a fun "open back" for those nights out.

The fabric is soft, the fit is great and it hangs so nicely on your body, accentuating the curves you want it to and "hiding" some of those you don't want to accentuate! I did find it a bit sheer (the top part, specifically) so I wore a slim tank (of a different color since the back is open) for extra coverage. There are so many different ways to change the look of this dress, I love it! You can add different belts, jewelry, scarves, jackets.
I can't wait to throw this on for work. It really is super comfortable and something I can comfortably wear for a long day in the office.

*Product received at a promotional price in exchange for review*

You can dress this up with a nice belt, jewelry, jacket etc. I believe there are so many ways to wear the dress even when its to cooler outside. I think it's also a great day to night dress. reviewText: Good

I needed a new backpack that was going to be able to hold a lot, be durable, cheap, and look nice. I got all of that in this backpack. It has a compartment that hold my 15.6 inch dell laptop nicely and also enough space in the main compartment for three large notebooks, a planner and my computer charger. This back would also be nice for tracking because it is deep so even when I have all of my books there is a lot extra space in the top left over for a sweater or something. It has the perfect amount of pockets as well. I only wish there was a water bottle compartment and that the straps had a *tad* more padding but that's just because I carry a lot of tension in my neck. It's lightweight and water resistant which are perfect for all weather conditions. Overall I'm in love with it and it's the perfect price for a college student  like me for a super cute good quality bag.

reviewText: I purchased this backpack about 10 days ago so it is still new to me, and I have not had a chance to test in the rain or other inclement weather.  That said, it is well constructed out of sturdy material.  It has one small interior zipper pocket for holding pens and other small items, as well as several other zipperless interior pockets.  It has three exterior zipper pockets.  The biggest is the large pouch compartment that you can see in the photo, but there is another smaller one on top, and a third that is on the strap side (the side that touches the user's back when worn).  My guess is that this third (smallish) compartment is for valuable items such as wallets, passports, etc., that you don't want exposed to pickpockets.  Anyway, my first impression is that this is a nice backpack.

I am a big fan of retro and vintage styles! This great looking bag has both,the retro and the vintage looks! Prior to getting into details about the bag,would like to shed some light on the origins of retro and vintage:
Retro: The word retro derives from the Latin prefix retro, meaning backwards, or in past times in other words, Retro style is an outdated style or fashion that has become fashionable again.
Vintage: The term Vintage relates primarily to wine and is an altered form of the French word vendage, meaning the grapes picked during a season. And according to Wikipedia, Vintage items are not as old as Antiques, yet has to be at least twenty years old! And the best Vintage is items from the forties and fifties.

Craftsmanship:
---------------------
Great looking bag,that can be used by both,males and females! It is made out of quality cow leather. Color is an impressive dark brown,which gives it that old leather look! no picture or video will show the real color of the this bag! In person the bag is completely different in quality and look!! Stitching is really made to last,as it is made with nylon threading,which most likely to outlast the rest of the bag,while keeping it together. Heavy duty zippers,and I like the fact that the main zipper is made in two parts,which gives you the advantage of unzipping one side at a time. Handle is also two parts that is rounded leather to give that extra strength,and joint by a leather flap. Shoulder strap is mainly leather and some durable canvas,with a nice size leather padding. Size is decent,as you can see in my pictures bellow,I was able to fit my 13" laptop comfortably inside the bag with some room to spare. Lining is average,with some padding to protect fragile gadgets inside. Two compartments,with a small zipper pocket,and a couple of pockets for smaller objects such as a phone or pencils.
Hardware is made out of brass like metal,fit for such a higher quality product!

Conclusion:
----------------
Have had this bag for a couple of weeks already,and up to this moment,I can't really find anything negative that would prevent me from giving it the deserving five star rating! Superior quality is written all over this bag! Purchase it and I promise you,not to regret such purchase! It can be used for business or pleasure. Still, if you're a skeptical person and not sure whether to trust other people's reviews or not! With Amazon's 30 day return policy, you have four weeks to try it out yourself, before returning it for any reason, with no questions asked, and in most cases Amazon will pay for the return shipping, in other words, it is a win, win situation!! With that said, I hope you find my humble opinion helpful in making or breaking your buying decision, if so please return the favor by hitting the YES button bellow while you're at it :)
summary: Elegance while keeping a professional look!

Now, this shoes fit me well but it's a bit tight and my feet is not wide. Maybe is due to the fact that they are new? Quality wise, I think they can handle couple of matches without any problem. The leather is very soft and they're lightweight

Now, I bought my shoes from a seller here in Amazon who I have never heard of. At first, i though their shoes were not Original Puma products. So I did a little be of research about them, many have given negative reviews about their costumer service but I took my chances and went to their site SHOEBACCA.com I found out that they're have a well developed site with enough detail about their products. So I decided to order my shoes from them, two days later I had my shoes at my front door. To make sure the shoes I received where original I went to Puma Online store and checked their Style Number which to my surprise matched, still was not enough. I went online looking for more answers. I concluded that the shoe is Original Puma just a great deal that's all
summary: I bought my shoes from a seller here in Amazon who I have never heard of.

This is a beautifully constructed backpack. The material is thick, sturdy canvas with leather accents. The color is in between khaki and coffee. The zippers are strong. The straps are woven but very strong. The upper flap is sealed with superficial snaps that can be adjusted with the leather straps. The pocket on the flap is a little bulky aesthetically, and the bag is a little wrinkly upon arrival, but I'm sure both of those issues will resolve once I use the backpack more. The lining is chocolate brown, and has a padded divider with a velcro sealed elastic strap that is great for holding a laptop. It fits my 13 inch MacBook Pro perfectly. I can hold a big textbook, two notebooks, snacks, water, my wallet and my bag of pens with plenty of room to spare. Great investment, great price, great quality.

reviewText:
Fits and it doesn't.  It's it extremely long.  The bottom looks like it was cut across, but not hemmed.  Threads did stick out at places where I had to cut them off.  No tags telling you the size/care/cleaning/materials/ size.  No packaging order in the bag either.  100% brand new tends to have a tag in it in my experience.  I have no idea what they believe cotton is, but it's a thin sparkly see through material. The pictures showing the back of the dress and the dark blue of the skirt make it look thick and solid.  It has to be a lighting trick, because this is more of a sheer mesh fabric.

I tried to cancel this before it shipped and they obviously wanted my money badly enough to hurry up and ship it.  (they were sure I'd get this in time, but I needed it two days ago) They didn't know that, but they didn't ask either.  It's only saving grace at all is that while wearing something under it, my daughter is going to wear it for her little cousins Frozen themed birthday party in december.  From the looks of the bottom of it, I'd guess I can just chop off the excess to make it the right height.  It fit in the arms and body as expected.....bu the length is like it comes off an assembly line where some underpaid worker just cops off a length determined only by their current mood.  I'm usually very careful of the companies I buy from on here, but was in a hurry this time.  I won't make that mistake again.

I am pleasantly impressed with this cancer awareness bracelet.

It is adjustable and will expand to fit almost any size wrist. My wrists are larger and I have issues with most standard size bracelets but was able to wear this one just fine.

I like that is states that is was made in the USA and by hand. The charms are solid and are well made. There are no rough edges or places that will catch or snag on clothing.

According to the packaging, the company donates a portion of the sale of this item to the American Cancer Society. That is nice and helps to encourage purchases as a way of supporting this cause.

I have not had any issues with the bracelet turning color or coloring my wrist. The packaging indicates that the wire is made with tarnish resistant 14 gauge wire which is strong enough to hold up to daily wearing.

Overall, I am happy with my bracelet and have enjoyed wearing it.

If you have any questions about my experience please leave me a comment. I will be happy to follow up on my experience with this product. reviewText:
I purchased this Expandable Wire Bracelet for Cancer Awareness for my wife as a gift. She has been slowly collecting Alex and Ani bracelets for a few years now. She has quite the collection. The one bracelet that she keeps asking for is a bangle bracelet to support me, I had brain cancer. Alex and Ani does not make one so I didn't think I would be able to buy her one.

Then I found this one. Now it is not the same high quality as an Alex and Ani but it also costs a fraction of the price. This bracelet is nice and it is for an important cause to our family. I really liked the fact that it was made in the USA, by hand. I also like that a portion of the proceeds go to the American Cancer Society. It is awesome that this bracelet is offered for 17 types of cancer and one general cancer awareness one.

The only real issue my wife had with this bracelet is the fact that it is really large. Because she has really skinny wrists and arms the bangle slides half way down her arm. Looking at the bright side, it won't get tangles with her other bangles.

 I purchased this bangle bracelet for a discounted price for my unbiased review and honest opinion. My wife says it's a wonderful addition to her bracelet collection.
I have a couple of Alex and Ani bracelets. I thought I would wear this with. It is definitely not the quality they are. However for the price it is ok. It is very big. I would buy again though.

reviewText:
REVIEW UPDATE 9-17-18:

This bracelet is still CUTE but SUPER TARNISHED now after wearing it a few x per week.

Do NOT expect it to LAST for SURE!!

BIG disappointment!!!!!!

===============================

I ordered two of these bracelets (two different messages on them) & love them both!

This Believe bracelet is beautiful & sweet!

I will be ordering some additional charms to put on it as we are making a "purity" bracelet for one of our daughters to represent those things she is saving for marriage.  I read about the concept in a magazine.  If she decides to give away any of those "gifts" (she chooses what her own gifts are for herself, ex.first kiss) & if she decides to give it away before the time frame she decides upon (upon engagement, at the altar, etc.) then she is supposed to give that charm to the one she would give her gift to.  It is a wonderful reminder to help a young woman keep her eye on the prize when temptation may arise.  Our daughter loved the idea when she read about it & so I just surprised her with her bracelet now that she is a teen and will face more temptation as she gets older.

I LOVE that these bracelets are adjustable to fit pretty much any wrist.  The charms are pretty, well cut (no rough spots), the text is centered on them, & they are super cute.  I'm sure some people may not care for two of the charms that came on mine ("handmade with love" is on one charm & "Made in the USA" is on the other charm.. I think they are both super cute charms & emphasize that they are handmade.  My daughter also likes them.) but they could be removed if desired.  We are leaving them on the bracelet because we like them in addition to the clear bead charm & the "Believe" charm.

I think this makes a wonderful gift & I do recommend it.

In fact we like them so much I just purchased another one at full retail as a gift because we do like it so much.  I will buy more for my other daughters in the future & also some as gifts for my girls' best friends when their birthdays come around.

I received a discount on this product for the purpose of my honest review, but as I said I like them so much I have already ordered another one & will order more.

Don't worry, I have integrity & do NOT lie in my reviews whether I paid full price or received a discount!

I USED TO think that people who received discounts on reviewed products were all dishonest just trying to get freebies or cheap products for writing fluff-filled reviews whether they actually liked the product or not, but I have since found out how things work and I mostly disagree with that now. I can't say that some people don't do that, but I can say that my experience has been a good one & the way I find products is I look for things I NEED & WANT, so I almost always have knowledge about them before ordering something. If it is the first time I've used a certain product I disclose that also in my review. That knowledge gives me some advantage in writing my reviews because I know what to look for in a product, how it may compare to others, etc. & then I can write a fair, honest, & hopefully helpful review!

I know that Amazon reviews are helpful & so many people look at them to decide if they should purchase a product. I also know seeing so many reviews from certain products that seem like they are all from discounts or freebies can be deeply discouraging. Take heart & know that my experience has been that many of the reviewers genuinely want to give you a fair & honest review. Again, there are some who use a product once or twice & then write a glowing review, but I'm not talking about them. I'm talking about those who take the time to THOROUGHLY test a product before writing a review. They don't write reviews after 3 days of receiving a product just because someone may want them to pound out a bunch of reviews in 72 hours.

Feel free to ask me any questions. I will do my best to follow up if you do.

If you found my review candid & helpful, please click on the YES button below.

Thank you!

I received this Message Charm Bracelet on a Sunday which is always a nice surprise, to receive a weekend delivery.  I ordered the "Believe' charms which included an oval shaped charm that says "Believe", a clear bead charm, a round charm with a floral print and a heart charm that says "Made in the USA."  I did have to tighten the hoops that hold the charms onto the bracelet for fear they would come off.  On some of the other reviews I noticed people receiving 5 charms on their bracelets where I received 4.  Maybe it depends on which one you order? One thing I found interesting is that in the item description it highlights that it "COMES IN A GIFT BOX!"  Like this is the very best part of the bracelet purchase.  It came with a plain white box and a plastic lid, nothing fancy at all and in fact it looked rather cheap. It is a pretty bracelet, looks very dainty and would make a nice for a younger sister or friend.  I can't really picture an older woman wearing this bracelet because the charms are a little whimsical and might not look the same on a more mature woman.  I'm not sure it would be able to stretch wide enough to fit over a larger hand.  It would have been nice to have received a piece of paper or note saying "Thank you for purchasing our product, we appreciate your business" but it came with nothing other than the not so fabulous gift box. I did receive this bracelet at a discount in exchange for an unbiased and honest review which I have given.  I take the reviews on Amazon seriously and I hope mine helped in your buying decision.
summary: It's a nice bracelet with a few flaws

reviewText:
This dress is so pretty! I wish I had a reason to wear this soon! After reading the reviews, I decided on a medium. I am 5'8 and weigh 135lbs. I usually wear a small, but decided on a medium since a lot of the reviewers said the dress runs a little small. I could have easily gotten away with a small as I prefer my dresses (especially retro ones) to be more form fitting. The medium still fits just fine and the dress is beautiful. It is very feminine and goes right to the knee. What the picture doesn't show is that it comes with a belt. This belt helped achieve the more snug look and feel I wanted. It is a nice fabric and not see-through (I worried it was). This is definitely going to be my Mother's Day dress! (Maybe Valentine's Day?) I would most definitely purchase this dress again! My only gripe is that it came extremely wrinkled and will most likely need to be ironed after every wash. No big deal! This dress is a STEAL!

I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This dress is so much prettier in person! I was absolutely astonished upon opening the package to see how gorgeous the colors were. The dress is made of quality material, the classiest dress I own! I was very nervous about the sizing of the dress because I usually wear between a 6-8, so I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly. There is a small zipper on the size which provides enough room to comfortably put on and take off the dress without being an eyesore. I love how the neckline of the dress falls perfectly along the collarbone. The dress cuts and falls perfectly in all the right spots, it makes me feel as though this dress was made for me. It makes me feel extremely confident and classy. It does come with a belt, that the same pattern as the dress. Id prefer a contrasting belt, but it's not that big of a deal.

I did receive this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased opinion.

reviewText: I am a huge fan of vintage clothing and style.  I have never ever purchased a dress from amazon though.  I have always just assumed the quality would be lacking.  Especially at the prices that some dresses such as this one are sold at.  When purchasing dresses similar to this one, I usually spend $50-120 per dress.  I won't lie, I was pretty skeptical about the quality that this dress would be.  I was completely shocked when I opened this dress.  It is gorgeous.  The fabric is extremely soft and durable.  The color is vibrant and absolutely gorgeous.  After expecting the seams they all seem to be extremely well sewn and very secure.  The cut of the dress is flattering to all  shapes and sizes.  That is one reason that I love dresses like this.  The dress is very pretty worn with and without a petticoat.  It makes a great Sunday dress or would be excellent for a night/day out with your girlfriends.  I am actually planning on wearing it for my next photo shoot.  I am definitely  going to purchase another in a different color.  You cant beat the quality and style of this dress at such an outstanding price.  I received this product at a free or reduced rate in exchange for my unbiased opinion.
summary: Beautiful and excellent quality! You must buy this dress!!

reviewText: Absolutely love this dress.  It's so classy and chic.  Only minor complaint is that it is a bit snug under the arms, but for this price, it really isn't an issue.

Luouse vintage 1950s floral dress is a refreshing bit of nostalgia.  We purchased the pink floral color.  The dress is very well made, with a lot of fine details such as the side zipper treatment.  It is inset in the side of the bodice nicely hidden.  The dress fits my daughter very well.  It has a flattering tailored shape.  The fabric is a nice, crisp cotton with vibrant colors. Even the belt is very nicely made.  This dress is great looking and fun to wear, compliments guarenteed.  I received this dress at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.

Update.  My daughter wore this to church today, and even people she didn't know  were telling her how pretty it was on her.

Material is nice and the sewing is nice.  Dress is not lined.  Arm holes are very small and positioned in a strange way on the dress as other reviewers commented.  I had a concern and their customer service department handled it appropriately.

First of all to note, the bracelet I received isn't what was ordered. The black beads were supposed to be normal (with the same shiny look the colorful ones have), but I got one with the lava rock beads. By the way, those are just textured plastic - NOT going to absorb essential oils like the product description claims. This mix-up is honestly not a big deal, but worth noting.

What I don't like is that the bracelet is too loose. I definitely don't have skinny wrists but this thing dangles and moves every time I change the position of my arm. Its far too big, and distracting every time it shifts around. It also occasionally causes the hairs on my arm to get pinched and pulled.

The other real problem is the cheap plastic holding the bracelet together. Its inevitably going to break, probably sooner than later. See for yourself in the picture.

The only reason I give two stars instead of one is because the beads ARE pretty. I would have been satisfied with this bracelet if it fit correctly and was made to last longer. I may at least repurpose the beads, eventually.

Even if you're not planning to get this exact style, I still highly recommend not looking here for a pride bracelet. The poor level of quality of this one leads me to believe any other styles are also not made well.

reviewText: This product came exactly as I expected.  The leather feels good and it was easy to get my passport into it.  The color is also pretty true to what you see online. Good overall headband. Has a good quality to it, it feels nice and it also fits my head nicely. A cool feature of this headband is that it has a pocket in the back of it which is big enough to fit a house key, some money and an I.D. So that is a pretty nifty feature. This seems to absorb sweat pretty well too which is what I bought it for, to keep the sweat from getting in my eyes and also keep my hair from flying around. This does both pretty well. One thing I don't like and this is why I gave it a 4 star rating, is because I'm not a fan of the name. Now on here the name of the company is Runbreeze and that's the name they have on the headband as well. But beware because that is not what on this headband. They must have changed it because it now says Runderwear. Which is my opinion is utterly stupid and does not sound good at all. RunBreeze was a million times better I think. Now this is not a big deal to me at all really, but I feel like some people would probably want to know that this is a little bit of false advertising. So all together this is a nice headband, it works well for what it is suppose to do and it is also comfortable, overall I give it 4 stars and would recommend it.

I received this product at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. All reviews are derived solely from my opinion of the product and never for the price I pay.
summary: Nice headband, but some false advertising!

is a little awkward and I definitely could tell that I had money in the pocket.  After the first few minutes though I did forget about it.  All in all, I am very happy with this purchase.  It kept my hair back, kept me cool and was easy on my head (no residual headaches, etc).  I will be purchasing more in the future.

reviewText:
This Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals by SmitCo LLC is Simply Stunning and would be a Wonderful Accent Necklace for Daytime Casual  and Evening or Special Occasion Wear Alike!
The Front of this 3/4" Rose Gold Plated Heart Charm is Raised (Convex) in the Center, which Truly Accentuates the 5 Rows of Tiny Crystal Accent Stones.
The Underside is concave in design and you can actually see the pinholes where the bottoms of the individual crystals have been set into place.
The Sparkling Crystals are Pin Set, not glued and Perfectly Positioned under a Lovely Ribbon of Rose Gold Plated base metal which forms the Top of the Heart.
This Gorgeous Charm is Securely Attached to a Sturdy Rose Gold Plated Bale.
The 15"  Adjustable Rose Gold Plated Delicate Link Chain that SmitCo has included with this Fabulous Charm features a Rose Gold Plated Lobster Claw Clasp and offers an Extender Chain with Seventeen 1/8" links.
SmitCo Includes an Attractive Gift Box with Every jewelry item they sell and the one I received my necklace inside of is a Pretty Peach color with a Satin Ribbon and Fabric Bow on the lid!
I received my necklace in exchange for testing and review and am giving this Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals a Very Well Deserved 5 Star Recommendation!

reviewText: Looks perfect!

OMG! This is the worst piece of jewlry I have ever purchase online! The chain broke  a few days after and the crystals are not like the picture, what they did is when they took the picture of the pendant they magnified the picture so you can see the stones, but with the naked eye you can't see it at all! Totally a big scam! It's only for a kid to wear, the necklace do not look like the picture at all, I used my a good camera which is my Iphone 6 to take a picture and like I said when I put the camera close to the necklace you can see the stone very well! I would return it but, I don't want to waste my time going thru the process and this Company knows that! I know one thing Karma is a bitch! Don't present your product to the public like that and expect to get a good result. Do not purchase this product! Don't be fooled by the description and wonderful words they use to sell this product, I was fooled by the picture! Fool me once shame on you! Fool me twice shame on me! And here comes Karma!!

This Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals is Yet Another Exquisite yet Affordable Offering from SmitCo LLC!!
The 3/4" Rose Gold Plated Charm Features 7 Rows of Sparkling, Multi-Faceted Crystals that Reflect the Light Remarkably Well.
It offers a Concave Design which Raises the Center of the Charm to Accentuate Each Row of Brilliant Crystals.
The 1/16" Crystals are individually Pin Set, not glued, to assure they remain in place during normal wear for years to come.
If you turn the pendant over, you will see the tiny pin holes where each stone has been carefully positioned.
The 1/4" Rose Gold Plated Bale through which the 15" Adjustable Rose Gold Plated Link Chain is strung, is securely attached to the charm by a Jump Ring which has been molded onto the upper right side of the Heart, allowing the charm to Hang at an Angle when worn.
The Delicate but Sturdy Link Chain is secured by a Rose Gold Plated Lobster Claw Clasp and offers an Extender which features 19 - 1/8" Links for Easy Adjustment of the overall length.
As with all of their High Quality, Affordable Jewelry Items, SmitCo ships this Elegant Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals on a bed of Felt Lined Foam, inside of an Attractive Ready-To-Gift Box.
It's a Perfect Accent Piece and would be Well Received by Women of All Ages.
I received mine in exchange for testing and providing my honest and unbiased review and would Highly Recommend it.

reviewText:
This rose gold heart necklace is tiny but gorgeous. The heart pendant is approximately  x 5/8. It may be on the smaller side but its full of sparkle. The pendant is loaded with shiny crystals. It definitely has a look of a real gold and diamond necklace.

There is a small decorative hole in the pendant for the chain to go through. I really like the design of this. It makes the heart dangle at an angle. The rose gold chain is very dainty yet durable. Its 16 long plus it has a 2.5 extender with a decorative tag at the end. I love extenders because you adjust the length to the desired position so it will fit perfectly with your top. The chain also has a small lobster claw clasp and is easy to get ahold of. The pictures do not do this necklace justice. This is definitely a must see in person. It looks like a high end piece of jewelry. I truly love it. This comes in a gift box and would make an excellent gift option for a loved one. Its simply stunning! I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: This Rose Gold Crystal Heart Pendant Necklace Looks Very High End and Resembles Real Gold and Diamonds

reviewText:
This Rose Gold Pave Heart Pendant Necklace from SmitCo LLC  is So Much Nicer Than I Anticipated it Would Be!
The 1/2" x 5/8" Rose Gold Plated "Puffed" Heart is Studded with Over 60 Multi-Faceted, Pin Set Crystals!
I know they are Set and not glued because when I turn the pendant over, I can see the End Points of the Crystals through the openings on the backside of the Heart!
The Sturdy but Delicate 15" Rose Gold Plated Link Chain is Strung through the Upper Left Portion of the Heart, so there are No Jump Links or Bales to detract from the Elegance of the Pendant.
I love that this pendant Hangs on an Angle.  When the Light hits it, the 10 Even Rows of Sparkly Crystals are Nicely Accentuated.
I also love that the chain Fastens with a Lobster Claw Clasp. For me personally I find that they are Easier to Manipulate than a rounded spring clasp.
The 18 Link Chain Extender is an another Plus in my book.
It allows me to Position this Gorgeous Pave Heart Pendant as High or Low as needed to Best Flatter the Necklines on All of my Outfits, so I can wear it for Both Daytime and Evening occasions.
To top it all off, this Rose Gold Pave Heart Pendant necklace arrived at my door in a Lovely Gift Box, complete with a Satin Ribbon and Bow attached to the Lid!
Receiving orders from SmitCo LLC is like celebrating Christmas or my Birthday Any time of the year!
So blessed that I could place this one at a discount in exchange for testing and review.
It's of such High Quality that I will be happy to pay the Extremely Reasonable Asking Price when I order one to gift to my friend this Holiday Season.
Well deserving of the 5 Star Recommendation I have given!

reviewText: So pretty!!! Cute packaging, my niece loved it!!!
