Rose gold is my new favorite. it's not a really shiny bright gold but it's a subtle eye catching color. I loved this necklace when I saw the picture and I loved it even more when I got my package in. The first thing is the package is SOO adorable. I could stick this in my daughter's stocking and it would be a wonderful gift or I could give it to any woman I know without having to gift wrap it.
Then when you open an adorable box to a beautifully made, rose gold butterfly I don't see any woman not falling in love. I mean really how could you not love it?? It's so nicely made and the butterfly is a decent size but it's not so big that it's overbearing. It's eye catching and the butterfly is set directly in the middle of the two sides of the chain.
That is prefect because it doesn't move around the chain. I hate when my pendant is behind my neck. That doesn't happen with this chain. The clasps is a lobster claw which is great because they  hold on and don't come undone like some smaller clasps. Over all I love this pendant and chain I would wear it anywhere even a dressy affair.
I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion but the opinion expressed is all my own.

This SmitCo LLC Rose Gold Butterfly Necklace is the Perfect Accessory to Any Outfit, be it Casual Day Wear or Elegant Evening Wear!
The Exquisitely Designed Rose Gold Plated Butterfly Pendant measures 3/4" Long from Top Wing Tip to Bottom Wing Tip and 1" Wide at the Top of the Wings. The Wings Taper to a 1/2" Width at the bottom of the pendant.
The Upper Inside Section of Each Wing features 7 Sparkling, 1/16" Multi-Faceted Crystals for a total of 14 Securely Set Glistening Stones.
The Back of this Rose Gold Plated Butterfly Pendant is Smooth and Shiny.
The Pendant is hung from it's 15"  Rose Gold Plated Chain by way of Two Rose Gold Plated Jump Rings which Loop through the Top Cut Outs in the Butterfly's Wings.  There is a Single Jump Ring on Each Side of the Pendant.
At one end of the Chain is an Easy to Manipulate, Rose Gold Plated Lobster Claw Clasp. The Other End features an 18 Link Chain Extender which enables the wearer to position the Butterfly according to their outfit's neckline.
As with All of their Affordable, High Quality Jewelry, SmitCo LLC packages this Beautiful Rose Gold Butterfly Necklace in a Very Pretty Gift Box complete with Satin Ribbon and Bow securely attached to the lid.
Butterflies have always had a significant meaning to me, as I feel as if I am in a perpetual state of metamorphosis, so I was especially pleased when offered the opportunity to receive this Rose Gold Butterfly Necklace at a reduced cost in exchange for testing and review.
I can honestly say it is Well Worth the Extremely Reasonable asking price and Worthy of my 5 Star Recommendation!
summary: This SmitCo LLC Rose Gold Butterfly Necklace is the Perfect Accessory to Any Outfit!

reviewText:
The picture does not do this mask justice.  Especially for the price, the intricacy of the cracked detail work and the vintage appearance is really spectacular.  This mask was also cheaper then many similar masks that we looked at, and none of them looked as good as this one.

Do note this has cloth ties as opposed to elastic or headband type attachment.  I actually like the ties.  The mask fits very comfortably and securely.  Though it helps to have someone else to tie it for you.

Also, the seller was great on this one.  I ordered the mask on 10/27(not needing it arrive until 11/5.  The mask actually miraculously showed up on 10/31.

I love this mask. It has that classic Venetian styling, with just a bit of oddness to it. Great for Halloween, Mardi Gras, or other festivities. I kind of wish it had an elastic band instead of the two tie-behinds, but I guess they were going for the classic style. This is very well constructed (thick and strong), with exceptional design work (including musical notes, which I enjoyed, being a musician). And, having just worn it while passing out candy for Halloween, I can honestly say that it was quite popular with both the kids, and the parents, who stopped to admire its appearance. Great buy for the wearer, or just a collector who wishes to hang it on the wall.
summary: Very nice, and nicely made Venetian style mask

reviewText:
Pros
Very sexy and cute outfit idea
Good color

Cons
Fit. Since this is basically supposed to be one size fits all I was expecting it to be stretchy in ALL the pieces. But I'd say only the tights were closest to be one size fits all.

The g-string didn't have any elasticity at all, which surprised because even underwear typically has very forgiving and stretchy elastic to allow for different shapes and sizes but this g-string definitely is NOT stretchy. Which also means if your butt and hips are not perfectly prioportioned for this size g-string it will either sag and have extra butt string hanging because you don't have enough to fill it out or the string on your hips will be very tight and unflattering and give you horrible muffin top and then the lace stretched out and doesn't even lay right anymore so it just looks really bad. I would recommend to the manufacturer that they make the g-string more stretchy so it can truly be a one size fits all and and if not at least write down the exact measurements of have to be in order for this to fit appropriately.

Moving on to the top. Again this would be super cute and sexy...if it fit right. I managed to get it on but i don't think it was quite big enough and I'm not even what you would consider heavy. I've actually lost a lot of weight and would be considered more slim than anything. I mean I'm not incredibly toned and skinny but definitely not fluffy at all anymore. So anyways, the second I tried to put this on I quickly realized the strings needed to be relaxed and tied because they weren't laced properly and they weren't tied so everything came undone. This led me to my second discovery. The top doesn't have specifically made spots for you to lace the ribbon, you literally have to wedge it through the lace and stretch the crap out of the lace edging which means this will NOT last a long time at all before he lace edging rips. Also because there's no specific spots for the lace to be threaded through it made it hard to figure out where and how to lace the ribbon. The whole process took a very long time (try upwards of 10-15 minutes) and was incredibly frustrating just having to write about it is irritating because it felt like such a waste of time.

Once I got it on it was okay but for all the time and trouble I went through it didn't seem worth it to me.

Then comes the next part. Putting on the tights and then snapping the top onto the tights. At first I thought the tights weren't big enough but if you have some patience you can stretch them up to fit but then your next problem is the fit of top of each stocking. It (like the g-string) is not stretchy AT ALL and really makes you look super fat unless you are the exact measurements meant for this outfit. Which seems to me probably like size 0-5.

As for the snaps they're made of a combo of clear rubber and a flexible plastic/rubber that goes over the top. You push the clear rubber down and it pops out of the plastic loop. This part wasn't too hard. What was hard was trying to get the string of the top to reach down to the stocking while simultaneously holding both in place AND trying to get the snap to snap on. I did it though! Once I finished it didn't look too bad. But I didn't feel super sexy in it generally speaking because the overall fit was very bad. I did however manage to make the most of the situation and got some really good pictures out of it but considering the amount of time and hassle it took to get the dang thing on and the poor fit I would NOT recommend this product and it definitely would not work if you're trying to quickly "slip into something sexy" there is nothing quick about this and the fit isn't very sexy.

If they can fix the fit of this outfit and fix the quality then I'd definitely recommend this and love it but right now as it is I would not recommend this or buy it again.

I received this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

The measurements in the photos I shared are of the crotch of the g-string. One is the straight down length and the other is the diagonal length of the crotch.

The close up of the lace is of the g-string to show its a raw edge that will fray and easily tear.

I also included a side view of the top so you can see that the lacing goes through the side lace edge and pulls really badly on the top. Even if it did fit perfect or at least better because the ribbon goes through the lace edging it would still ruin the top and as a result makes this poor quality and won't last long at all.
summary: Cute idea but really lacking in quality

reviewText:
In general this is an okay outfit and did fit me. It is a sexy outfit but it is also one time use (or if you are careful then maybe two) because of the quality. Also since this is a one size fits most kind of item then do not expect it to fit overly well and certainly very far from a perfect fit. I would say it fits well anyone from a size small (or xs) to a size medium, but not larger sizes. While the top you can adjust, the bottom underwear is not that stretchy. I will go through a few details:

-The top is nice but do note that the garter straps are only in front, none in the back. Also the tie strings on the sides do not come tied like they are shown in the picture, rather they are tied wider apart so if you wish to re-tie them it is not so convenient and may take a while to get the thin string through the tiny lace holes. One good thing is the top shoulder straps are adjustable.

-The g-string bottom is not appropriately sized since the vertical string is way too long (may need to make a knot of it at the top) while the horizontal band may run snug. And the triangular lace part is XXXS, not as pictured in the description photos.

- The stockings are probably the best piece out of this set of three, they feel a bit more durable. Although the lace around the top of them is extremely thin and will likely just roll into a line for you also.

I had received this product at a slight discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. So I do hope you find my review helpful in your purchasing decisions. One last piece of advice, if this outfit survives and will need to get washed then I highly recommend air drying it... do not put it in the heat dryer!
summary: It is okay, sexy-looking but poor quality and a mediocre fit.

I usually buy clothes that I feel are at minimum a 7, and try to use buy something I feel an 8 or higher about - thus ensuring I'll wear it more than once or twice, and that I'll own mostly "I LOVE IT!"/"This makes me/my XYZ look fantastic!" items, vs. "eh, it was cheap, and on sale..." It's part of the philosophy I adopted when I graduated college, to own more of an adult wardrobe without owning 17 of the same shirts, just in different colors. Smart choices, that will lead to a long lasting, classic wardrobe, with minimal wasted money.

I had to explain that, to explain that I was unsure about this dress. I was waffling between a 6.5 and a 7. In the photo, the top (with the black buttons) seems to make up a third of the dress and be a much larger portion that the top of my size 12. As a result, I was left more conflicted (as I'd liked the photo), and it was my boyfriend who really convinced me that he really liked it (he doesn't like anything. Everything is "it's ok"), so I kept it. I bought this to be able to wear to work - it's a color I love and it's visually interesting. The darts do have the potential to sit a bit high on my 'lady lumps', but I moved around when trying this on, and it wasn't a big problem. I also didn't realize from the photos, it comes with a belt. I may or may not use it.

So I like the dress, but I'm not yet in love with it, and I will try and post photos of me in it once I get a chance to wear for comparison. For reference, I ordered an 12, as I am 5'4 but very busty with an hourglass shape. It's a nice fabric, a bit stretchy (so the bottom doesn't seem voluminous in comparison to the top), but not clingy so that I feel I need Spanx or something. I would recommend this to someone else, as I think it's a cute dress and worth giving a shot.

I washed this in a delicates bag, by itself, on our delicates cycle (we don't have a hand wash or a wool cycle), using the Forever New washing powder (only thing I use on delicates/bras/handwash items), and lay it flat to dry on a drying rack. Great results, and I couldn't love this dress more.
summary: It came with a belt! Color is definitely true to the photo (and is glorious).

I don't really have any real problem with these lenses.  I purchased these lenses for an old pair of RayBan sunglasses that I've had for years which are not out of production.  I couldn't find the lenses that go to them anywhere which were the actual lenses, so I settled on these.  They fit fine once I got them to go into the frame and they're probably as polarized as they should be for what they are.  I definitely got what I paid for.

They are plastic (or whatever polymer is used for sunglass lenses of this sort) instead of glass like ray ban lenses.  That said, it took some manipulating to get them to bend into the frame.  I was very frustrated by the time I finally got the lense into the frame.  However, once I got it into the frame, it tightened down over the lense and fit nicely.  The lenses do not say RayBan on them like the lenses from the factory.  If you are a purist like myself, you'll feel strange wearing them and feel a need to explain to people the situation of why the lenses don't say RayBan, and want to explain that the glasses are actually RayBans and not knock offs.  Then you'll want to curse RayBan for not stocking the lenses!

So... I digress.  The lenses are fine. They fit good.  They are lightweight (a plus if you don't like actual glass lenses supplied by RayBan).  They work as advertised.

I received this bag in the orange-brown color and am impressed with it's rich appearance. It is elegant and professional and perfect to take with you to the office or on a shopping trip. It has 3 compartments on the inside of the bag. Two zippered ones and one in between the two zippered ones that closes with a magnetic snap closure. Each compartment is easy to reach and the zippers are strong. The lining a silk-like material and appears durable and strong. The part I was most disappointed about is the strap. You would think a bag of this quality would have a shoulder strap to match the bag. I was disappointed with the fabric material of the strap and was surprised it was not made of full leather like the rest of the bag. I also thought the strap was a little short (but then, I am 5'10" and prefer longer shoulder straps so I can wear it cross body). Despite it's short comings I still rate this bag 5 stars. I was debating between a 4 and a 5 star, but then decided my issue with the shoulder strap is a minor one and one that many would disagree with. As such I figured 5 stars probably better reflects the quality of the bag. I received a free sample of this bag in exchange for my review.

It took me like forever to decide about what bag I should buy to carry my laptop! I am so glad that I made up my mind and bought this beautiful bag. The color is exactly as it looks in the pic. The material is beautiful and my laptop (13 inch macbook air) fits like a glove. The bag has three compartments so I put the charger, mouse, mouse pad and my earphones inside the second one that comes with the zipper and inside the one in the middle that closes with a magnetic clip I put my wallet, keys and phone for easy access.
I really am ecstatic about the bag and let me tell you something I normally never talk about but that is a big part of my life. I suffered from hemiplegia I suffered partial loss of movement in my left arm and leg (I can walk but I can't use my hand) so closing some zippers requires using my teeth to aid my right hand which is why I would usually left my others bags unzipped so I could reach everything inside easily, but there was always the risk of something falling and getting lost or damage; that is not happening anymore with this bag I can close the zippers in the Yahoho bag with just one hand and there is no risk of nothing  falling from the middle compartment it closes automatically, and I can still reach everything I need in no time.

The seller was awesome as well they send it right on time and it came inside a fabric bag and bubble wrap over it, for protection, they really fulfill my every expectation. I might buy the other three in every color.

Thank you so much.

I ordered the white t shirt with a pocket.  I am always skeptical when ordering from overseas, especially since this one is a one size fits most type of deal.  Once I put it on, right away I loved the way it felt!  It feels like a sort of stretchy, soft material but it is loose fit and is not super tight on my belly.  I love that part.  I also love the way it feels!  I don' t know what the material is, but it is SUPER soft !  The only downside for me is that the front of the shirt is a little short for me.  It seems to be a high low shirt, so the back is perfectly fine.  I just like my shirts a little longer in the front.  So I just wear a tanktop underneath and it is just fine that way.  I usually wear a size medium in juniors, or xs/small in women.  I am short though, so if you have a long torso the front of the shirt may be too short.  Overall I do really enjoy this soft feeling shirt!
I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest unbiased opinion.

We received this gown in rose goose as a baby shower gift, but haven't used it until now. Our daughter is 2 months (11lbs, 23") and she loves wearing this over a onesie to sleep. We used to swaddle her for bed but now she wants her arms out so we tried this one night and she loved it.  Her arms are free to move but still warm and her legs and feet are covered. Plus the open bottom makes diaper changes a breeze.  I came on to Amazon to buy some more!!  Also, we have only washed it in cold and dried on low (per directions) so it hasn't shrunk.

I purchased this gown for the USMC 2015 Ball. It is GORGEOUS. The quality is great. It arrived as promised and I loved it--right up until I tried it on. It came out of the packaging such a mess (as expected when buying by mail) that I had to spend 2 hrs steaming it out before I could even try it on--but that was my choice to buy this way and to save that money by steaming it myself and avoiding store overhead. The dress, again, is GORGEOUS. The problem? The cut! From the waist down, it fit me beautifully--but from the waist up--it was a DISASTER. If I placed it such that the built in bra cups were on the bustline, then the shoulders of the garment rose 4" above my shoulders. If I dropped it down onto my actual shoulders, then the bra cups were at my waist and the waist was somewhere on my thighs. It took me a while but I FINALLY figured out the issue. This dress is made for a VERY VERY large bustline. The 24W could easily accommodate a EEE. Without the EEE's....its like the grand canyon inside this dress for anyone with a smaller bustline. So--to wrap up, if you have a very large bustline--order this dress in your regular USA women's size based on the chart on their page. If you DO NOT have a very large bustline, either prepare for extensive and EXPENSIVE alterations or skip this one and move on. I was hugely disappointed that this dress did not work for me, but the dress itself is beautiful once steamed and pressed.Grace Karin Women's Black Tulle Embroidery Half Sleeve Long Formal Prom Dresses (24W)
summary: Great Quality, Poor Cut, HUGE in the BUSTLINE but GORGEOUS DRESS!

reviewText:
This was a really great way to have added fake hair without wearing a full wig.  Not only would it be great to seem like you have a short haircut underneath a hat or turban, but if it matches your hair color (if you currently have any), then it can be paired with a pony tail for a sporty bang look, (of course, if you attach it to a headband, or have a way to Velcro bangs into a headband.)

Pros;
It works as advertised.  This is just the hair attached to Velcro, NOT hair attached to a headband, or hair attached to a hat.  However, instead of having different hats with different hair colors, you can just exchange the hair color as much as you would like.
It arrived on time, and seems to be brand new.
The length of the hair is uniform, and the color is even throughout.
There were not any loose hairs in my product.
Cons;
It is hard to match hair color exactly.
The bangs to not go ear to ear, instead, they go from one side of your forehead to another.  I would measure your face to see exactly how long it really is.

If you thought this was helpful, please say so by clicking the button! I would really appreciate helping more people.

Disclaimer; I received this product at a discounted or reduced rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I am given no compensation for a positive review, and I suffer no repercussions for a negative review, so all statements have no reason to be false or inaccurate. The only type of compensation I have received, is given before a review is made, and simply is a discounted or reduced price for the product that I am reviewing. I had no obligation to leave a review or any positive feedback.

These fringe bangs from Headcovers Unlimited  look so cute with a headband, scarf, a hat, or a turban. I ordered the ash blonde blend  and it looks really natural. The quality of these bangs is really good and looks like natural hair. Wearing a wig all the time can be super hot and itchy. This is a simpler more comfortable way to keep your head covered in style. I would recommend these fringe bangs because of their high quality and the ability they give you to keep feeling good. I ordered these things in conjunction with the headband and they work really well together. I must disclose that I received these bangs at a discount or for free in exchange for this honest review and these are really good.

After my friend's hair began to fall out, she withdrew and never wanted to go out anymore. Doctors quickly diagnosed her with Alopecia areata, which is when a person's immune system mistakenly attacks their hair follicles and causes hair loss. To encourage her to come out more without feeling so self-conscious about her hair, I ordered her the Fringe Bangs for Headwear by Cardani as well as the Instant Hair Headband by Headcovers Unlimited.

When the bangs arrived, I was surprised just how realistic they looked. The hair fibers are thin and look exactly like real hair. They even move like real hair. The bangs are a little over seven inches wide and two and a half inches long. They sit nicely on my friend's head, and the blend of colors give it a very natural appearance. My friend has commented on how the bangs feel light and do not scratch or irritate her skin. She really likes wearing them.

These bangs are great for anyone who has experienced hair loss for a medical reason. My friend has alopecia but they would be just as suitable for someone with hair loss from chemotherapy or any other condition.  They can also be worn by those who just want to change their look for a day, and wish to have bangs without committing to them long term.

Just to be clear, when ordering this item, you are only receiving the bangs, not the headband as well. You need to order the headband separately. I am very happy with the bangs, and my friend is absolutely thrilled with them. They make her feel much more confident to leave the house and socialize without worrying about people staring at her hair. I definitely recommend these bangs to anyone in the market for them.

I must disclose that this product was received at a discounted cost for my honest and unbiased review. My opinion was not altered due to the product being discounted. If I do not believe in a product, I will not give it a positive rating. Please leave a comment if you have any further questions. Thanks for taking the time to read my review!

As the completely unhelpful 2 star review said, these are not "demon earrings"; they are the Samulet AKA Dean's necklace.

That said, these earrings are AWESOME. It's impossible to find merchandise that *actually* looks like the pendant in the show, of a decent size and decent price. This is the closest I've ever seen. (May be worth noting that they are not double-sided like the "real" thing but they'd probably be a little heavy on the ears if they were.) I almost want to buy another pair to make a proper Samulet necklace out of.

If you know a Supernatural fan who's less into necklaces and more into earrings, this would be an excellent gift.
These are NOT demons. They are inspired from Dean's protection amulet that is rumoured to burn hot in the presence of God.

reviewText: Love the belt ! It's functional and stylish all at a great price!

A great product.  I bought 2, one in black and one in brown.  After cutting to an appropriate length it was a simple matter to slide the end through the buckle and adjust to size.  It's even easier to adjust the fit as the day progresses with the 1/4" increments.  I've worn the black one for over a week now for all types of activities and there is no indication that it has ever been worn!  On a standard belt with holes it would have been obvious which holes have been used and there would be other signs of use.

Contrary to reviews that the buckle is hard to release, I found that the release works very easily and quickly.  Do yourself a favor and look at the buckle BEFORE you wear it and you will have no trouble.  Perhaps even try the rachet and release first.
summary: A Brilliant Product and I Rarely say that.

reviewText: Was looking for a belt like this (namely the Anson belt), but decided to go with this instead. Literally the same design, but at a significantly less price. Setup is simple - cut to your desired length and then shove that end into the pronged part of the buckle and snap it in place. That part actually took me a little bit to get it clamped shut since the teeth had a hard time going into the leather, but once I got it clamped it's not coming out without some force. Overall a great belt and as others have mentioned the design of the buckle makes it look like a regular belt, but without any holes. Will be buying another belt + buckle soon to mix and match.

reviewText: I loved the print (turquoise blue roses, beige background).  The problem was the fabric.  Unlike other pencil skirts I've purchased, this material is thinner.  I bought a size small (I'm 5'4 120lbs) and it fit, but you could see through the fabric.  Other skirts hug and stretch, but don't show your undies. This fabric showed your stuff.  BUT, I loved the pattern so much that I returned it and bought a larger size and the large size doesn't stretch, just hangs off my hips and it isn't see through.  The disadvantage of that is it's a different look, more like a maxi skirt than a pencil skirt wearing it two sizes too big.  The darker colors are probably a safer bet.
summary: good print/pattern, but fabric too thin/see through.  Order a larger size.

reviewText:
I purchased this as a gift for my wife.  She doesn't buy things like this for herself and she had a threadbare Vera Bradley wallet that really should have been retired a few years ago - she had discouraged me from helping her replace it!  Now that our children are older she doesn't like to carry a purse everywhere she goes.  She had take to carrying a cheap (synthetic fiber of some sort) cross body bag that held her old wallet, car keys, and phone, but it wasn't always a good look with her outfits.

So, I began searching for a tasteful wallet that could do a number of things at the same time.  In short, this wallet has enough room that she can include the smart key for our Toyota in the change purse and slide her iPhone 6 into one of the bill sections and still clasp the wallet closed with the magnetic flap securely.  The pop out wristlet make it easier to hold on to.

This wallet is well made and looks great.  The leather is soft and the design on the fabric is very nice.  This wallet looks good by itself, in her larger red Coach purse, and also in her less formal "sport" bags she grabs for quick on the go trips.  When I started looking for a wallet for her I did not know how hard it would be to find something tasteful and utilitarian, and I was glad to find this HOBO wallet.  It's a nice blend of modern styling and old fashioned charm (change purse).  She loves it and that makes me happy.
Superb quality!
Love love this hobo wallet has 13 spots for cards got it as a gift for my mom and she loved it as much as I did
summary: Love love this hobo wallet has 13 spots for cards ...

I didn't want these super tight because of the holes, I was afraid of looking like a stuffed sausage lol. Their not too bad, but I probably won't be wearing them often or when I do i'll wear sheer black tights underneath to avoid over spill. Other than my own mistake, these are cute. Their long enough, came exactly as pictured, and arrived quickly. More low rise than I was anticipating, I'm 5'7 with a curvier build and I find myself having to pull these up all the time because my butt is too big. Again, my own mistake for not ordering another size up. They would probably fit fine if I was shaped with a more average build or flatter bottom. This a common problem with all my jeans. If you have a bigger butt I would recommend sizing up tho. 5 stars for quality & shipping.
summary: I didn't want these super tight because of the holes

I once tanned in tanning beds year round to avoid being my naturally pale self.  My skin tone resembles boiled chicken in its undisturbed state and I always thought that was unattractive until skin cancer became a real fear in my world.  Now, swimming or lounging cannot be done without being slathered in sunscreen, but thanks to my glorious pigmentation, it doesn't always help 100%.  I started wearing Rashguards after one particularly bad burn I received while on a cruise to the Caribbean and haven't been without one since.  This rashguard is now my absolute favorites because of its versatility.  The adjustable strings make it less than a cover-up and more of a total package.  It's easy to go straight from the pool in your swim shirt to grab a quick bite to eat in your full covered dress.  I got so many compliments on this shirt while on the beach this summer and was told by all that liked it that the front zipper was the most attractive feature!  It is something that sets it apart from the other items like it and I think it should definitely be seen as a key selling feature.  I purchased the beautiful purple top and it compliments all of my bathing suits, no matter what their color.  This material is meant to cling to the body and is very true to size if that is how it's intended to be worn.  I highly recommend!

reviewText: I ordered XLT, which size I have been wearing for decades.  Even being a large guy, this shirt is way too large -- both around the middle and in sleeve length.  Most sleeves on XLT are 36/37.  My arms are 37.  This shirt has to have at least 38 sleeves.  Maybe it was mislabeled and should have been a XXLT.  But such a mistake is a crime for a high end shirt label.  I have seen Cutter & Buck shirts in catalogues and they are very, very expensive so I hadn't previously purchased them.  So I was happy to get this shirt on Amazon for a good price.  Yes, the fabric and sewing quality are very good, even though the sizing is way off.  However, the quality is no better than other higher end brand names, or even large department store own label quality shirts, all for much lower prices.  My intrigue with Cutter & Buck products is over.

reviewText: Very cute. My daughter loves them.

This shirt is so sexy and well made!

I'm a size 2 and ordered the 4 since it is the smallest option. It is just a tad loose on me, which means that the sizing is accurate; it is a true 4. It is a clingy material and really hugs the body. So, it's great for showing off your curves, especially since the shirt is long enough to hit your hips. The V neck is quite deep and if you have a smaller chest, you may need to pin it or put a few stitches in it. I wear a 32DD and I fill out the top nicely. It shows some cleavage, but it didn't look trashy. The sleeves are really cute as well.

The shirt is very well made and it sewn perfectly. The material is soft and has some stretch to it. I ordered the wine red and it looks exactly like the picture. The top is also really easy to care for and it did not shrink whatsoever.

I'm extremely satisfied with this shirt. It is sexy and can be worn for a night out, but can also be styled in a more casual manner. I would absolutely recommend this top to others!

Disclosure: I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review. All opinions are my own and based upon my unbiased experience with the product.

I like the size of it. Not too small, not too large. It feels accurate to the show. The box and display for it is great as well. Comes with an extra courage tag, which is nice bonus. The magnet is in the tag, and it feels like they grab the crests very well. They will stay in all day, but come off very easy. Wearing it it's pretty lightweight. The chain seems the right length it needs to be.

My friendship crest (the one with the circle with the two side waves, for those unfamiliar with the show) didn't fit in as well as the other crests. It's slightly too tall. Also, I was a bit sad to find out the back of the tag is just the shell of the front. I was hoping for a flat back. And since everything's alloy metal, it tends to collect fingerprints easily.

Still, I'm happy with this purchase, especially since the other sellers were selling just one crest and tag for more money.

Do you have a pair of plain boots? Here's the answer to dressing them up. After a friend paid almost $100 to buy a pair of boots that had a braided leather band wrapped around three times with a couple of tassels at the end, I thought, what a cute idea but a ridiculous price. So, I checked out Amazon (Really, is there anywhere else to go?), and I found this adorable little belt. I ordered one to start to see if my idea was feasible. It was, and I ordered a second one. Now I have a pair of $25 boots that used to be plain but are now all fancy with their new braided leather wrap with tassels! Depending on the boot, you may find the belt too long. Just cut it and glue it back together with gorilla glue. Also, if they are flats, you'll have to trim the tassels, but your boots will be oh-so-cute!
Came broken in pieces. The rope itself is cute, the hardware is crap and came in pieces. I would give it 1 star, but it was only several $'s and the rope is nice.

Looks just like the picture, super cute. You can attach the chain a couple different ways (or you could also use a different strap if you wanted instead), you can do it the regular way with one clasp on each side for a long crossbody style, or you can attach both claps to one side and loop it through on the other side (clip one end on, loop the chain through the other ring, and then clip the other end next to the first one). I've been doing it the latter way because it's more versatile, you can hold both sides evenly for a short over the shoulder or crook of the arm look, or pull one side all the way out and leave the short end tight around the back of the bag to keep it long. I took some pictures so you can see what I mean. It doesn't look as neon in the pictures as it does in real life, it's actually a bit brighter and I personally love it.

The actual clasp you use to close it is a tiny bit stiff at times but in no way is it a major issue.

I'd definitely recommend this bag, so cute and functional, especially for under 10 bucks.

reviewText: Pretty dress liked the pockets the material was not what I expected.

This dress looks really cute on the model. I followed manufacturer's recommendations and ordered up  - I am usually a US size 4, so I ordered the dress in size 8. Despite that, it's just uncomfortably small, especially in the shoulders. It does not drape as shown in the photo. That's size/fit. The biggest disappointment was the fabric. This is absolutely NOT a linen/cotton blend. Honestly (as another reviewer stated), it feels like all polyester, or perhaps with just a touch (and I mean a touch), of cotton. There is no "texture" to the fabric, and it doesn't have the "hand" or drape of a linen/cotton blend. The seller has reached out to me after requesting a refund, but he wants me to measure and take photos, and show him the discrepancies. I simply wrote back and explained my displeasure. Really, since I now know the fabric, I wouldn't even re-order in a larger size. I'm very disappointed as the dress looks great in the photo. Also, the color is very true to the photo. One other note - the dress has set-in sleeves, not kimono-style or drop-shoulder sleeves so if you order up, this may also affect the "drape" of the garment. Just sayin'. Good luck!
summary: Sizing seems way off on this one.

reviewText: Outstanding swimming suit just had a baby was able to nurse in it  covered up baby tummy

I really wish I had done my hair pin-up style for my review photos. (Don't laugh!) I'll definitely be rocking victory rolls with it this summer, though. :) Let's start with size. I'm typically pretty nervous about ordering clothes online, but this bikini came perfectly sized. The top is a bit loose but that is due to my personal body type, and can be adjusted with tying the strings a little tighter. The fabric used seems to be quite durable, but as with any bikini, I reccomend hand washing so you don't get those little fuzzies from the washing machine. Not sure this one would, but I like it so much I'm not going to try and find out. The little tie in between the padded cups on the top does not come untied, it's sewn to look that way. So no fear of accidental exposure on the beach! The bottoms are so cute with a scrunched detail, which helps hide any imperfections you may have... (muffin top, perhaps?)... I've had three kids so this works wonders for me. :) I am very pleased with this bikini and the only thing I would change would be the option to order different size bottoms than top. Other than that, it's flawless! So if you are thinking about buying it, do it!!  I received this product in exchange for an honest review. All thoughts and opinions are 100% MY own.

Louise Maelys Polka Dots Halter High Waist Bikini Swimsuit is by far the cutest swimsuit I have ever owned. The retro attraction of the bright red halter top over dark blue and white polka dotted bottoms will have you looking good and catching everyones eyes. I am a mother, so I have a tummy covered in stretch marks, this high waist suit covers them all! For a long time I thought my only swim wear options were tee shirts over bikinis or full one pieces. Another great thing is the ruffled front on the bottom piece, it makes you look thinner and hides the little fat pouches around your tummy by making them look nonexistent. My size measurements are a 36b on top, and a 42in hip span at my widest point with a 27in in my midsection, Im 58 and 125lbs. I ordered a size large swimsuit thinking I needed one big enough to get over my giant birthing hips, and because I often have to order sports bras in large to fit comfortably on my rib cage, and because I feel safer ordering the next size up when ordering online. I will tell you, this suit is incredibly true to size. My poor top half was swimming around in empty cup space, so I will need to reorder next summer or find a new top to swap out until I can grow. The lower half fit great though, and is incredibly stretchy, I expect to be able to wear it even if a few months pregnant, due to how elastic it is. Upon receiving the swimsuit I promptly put it on, and uploaded photos to my Facebook, within minutes of having posted I had several likes, questions on where I got it, and one friend even ordered one for herself on the spot! This swimsuit is hot, and will give you some great confidence boosting attention when in use. Retro is very much in fashion, and this suit looks like a timeless art piece. I am very impressed with the quality of this swimsuit as well, I highly recommend it. I received this suit for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: I ordered a size up because the other reviews said the dress fit small. I usually wear a large, and the x-large fit pretty well. The material of the dress is really nice and thick. I didn't wear a slip under it or anything and felt like I was adequately covered. The length of the dress hit me at a goofy spot and was a little bit too long. Also, I thought the gold curve part of the dress (around the mid-section) would start right under my bra line. However, the gold lines started in the middle of my chest. I thought it looked a little funny. Overall, I like the dress but could do without the gold. It just didn't hit me in the right spots. I also thought the gold was going to be more "blingy", but it was flat and not very sparkly.

I got into the jewelry section of Amazon by mistake.  Then I could not quit looking at the pretty costume jewelry in that section.  The next thing I know I was pulling out my VISA credit card and charging it up.  My problem was not that the individual pieces I was purchasing were expensive, because they were NOT.  My problem was that I could not stop buying jewelry.  After I submitted my $800 plus order, I thought "WHAT HAVE I JUST DONE?"  I had not seen the jewelry in person, nor had I known the brands, nor had I known the quality or the size, etc., etc. and I panicked.  Well, it was done.  So, I waited for my order.  My order came in partial orders, because the jewelry was coming from different vendors / stores.  However, when the orders came in, and I opened the package and saw my jewelry.....all of it......I was so pleasantly surprised.  All of it was beautiful, great quality, fit perfectly, and priced well.  I loved everything I received, over 100 jewelry pieces, rings, earrings, necklaces, bracelets.  I wear it too.  I get compliments on all of it.  Some of the pieces are for evening wear, so I can't wear it to work.  I did not have to return a thing.  Well, that's why I work.  I work to pay my bills, but also to enjoy things I can buy.  Amazon is good about returns and refunding your money, so I wasn't too worried.  Jennifer in Houston, Texas.

reviewText: Eyeglass cases just don't last forever. Opening and shutting my case several times a day every day to switch between my glasses and my sunglasses takes a toll. It was time for a new case and I have to say I love one! It's bright and colorful and the pattern is adorable. It's easy to find in my purse. My only complaint (and it's minor) is that it is really big. That is necessary if you have a large pair of sunglasses, but my sunglasses are the same size as my regular glasses, so both pairs knock around a bit in this large case. But that's not a fault of the case so I didn't take a star off. I knew it was big when I bought it. Just be aware if you have smaller glasses or sunglasses. Overall, love this!

reviewText: My boyfriend bought me these sexy american flag mini jeans shorts as a present, but unfortunately I think he bought it too small. I would suggest definitely ordering them in a size or two larger, however I plan on having them as inspiration to slim down because they are ADORABLE!!! They totally have the daisy duke feel and look to them and they are definitely sexy. The shorts are well made, and it's put together very well. The negative thing I have to say about this is that the colors are really faded. i didn't expect the colors to be bright and vibrant, but it looks like it was pretty washed out. To me personally, the design made it worth it even though the colors aren't bright. Disclaimer: I was provided a sample of this product in exchange for a fair, honest and thorough review. Even though I received this product at lower cost I have rated and reviewed this product without bias, based solely on my experience with it. To make sure that it wasn't just me being crazy, I laid them out together, and there is almost an inch difference between the shortest to the perfect. Overall, they wash well, and are very comfortable. I like the cut (for the most part), and am looking at purchasing more in varying colors.
summary: Lengths vary with same sized shirts

I am totally in love with this Elegant Simple Chain Gorgeous Multilayer Choker Egyptian Style Party Necklace from SR. I chose to get it in the gold color as it matches alot of my fall clothes. This necklace is perfect for any type of occasion (work, party, casual, date night). The necklace is long and comes down to around my midsection. It has alot of detail and beading to it.

When I first recieved it I didn't know what to expect. It came in a nice silver gift box with a bow, the necklace is nicely placed inside without  it being tangled or damaged. There was no pieces missing (everything is intact). The necklace looked exactly like the stock photo.

Because of how big the necklace is I don't hang it up with my others, I keep it stored in the box it came in.

The necklace is made of base metal and three layers of white plated, nickle free and tarnish free, and a lobster clasp hook for a comfort fit.

This looks absolutely amazing with a solid color shirt and either leggins or dark color skinny jeans and either heels or knee high boots this is what makes the necklace pop.

I have received many compliments on this necklace from me trying it on to just having it sitting in the box. Everyone ask where I got it from.

I highly recommend this necklace for either yourself, or for someone as a gift for a bridal shower, prom, birthday. The price is reasonably priced. You would think it would cost more than the actual price.

You won't regret or be dissapointed in this purchase.
summary: My favorite necklace of all my necklaces

reviewText:
Love, love the jacket! However the Velcro star that attaches to the front is cumbersome at times and gets easily bent. The Velcro backing also is starting to peel away from the constant on off placement and looks like it will have to be re-glued at some point. If the manufacturer was able to make a split star that could be affixed to the front I'd request that in a heartbeat. Also the jacket is tight around the waist, so if you have any semblance of a gut, it will feel like a corset at first! :) and this wears hot! You will sweat in it as there are no vent zips on the torso. The good thing is that you can open the vents in the sleeves to help out with some flow. I'm going to try and follow up with the manufacturer to see if there is an option to get a split star.

Con: The star is made out of rubber, in the near month that I have had it, the paint/coloring is starting to rub off. So there is that.

reviewText: This Is my 2nd Montana West handbag purchase.  I love the style and the matching wallet.  I would of given it 5 stars but the leather does not seem as top quality.  It does not have that leather smell.  But the stitching is good, The fit on the shoulder, zippers and buckles are sturdy. The color is vibrant and true to the photo.

I give it five stars but why is the sipper even necessary?  The location of the zipper is "smart" but the fine tooth zipper is rubbish. Use a stronger zipper please! I had to repair the zipper twice! Metal zipper is recommended.

The fabric is decent and the cut is beautiful! It fit great. My wife is 5'2" 120 and 36C it's just right everywhere.

Why is the zipper breaking you ask? The plastic fine tooth zipper hangs up at the seams of the bust line and the bottom of the dress.  The last two dresses have the same problem.

This is the best CC purse I've ever owned. After a few years it's still in perfect condition and I'm rough on products. I bought the matching wallet also. I will buy this brand in the future. Both very high quality and VERY DURABLE. I'm constantly complimented on it also. :)
summary: This is the best CC purse I've ever owned

This particular dress, looked so good on me. I'm a Xl/14. I thought to go smaller because of the style of the dress so I bought a large. ONE problem was the boob department. My racks too big! (38C) HOWEVER...I pull them  up, with the bra cup and it gives me this corset like cleavage, like you know their squashed but a sexy squashed.  I WAS gonna return it but I think I'm going to keep it because it's too freaking cute. I bought the XL in the other color and its a little too BIG in the boob area! BUT, it STILL looks awesome!! Either way the dress still looks good and I look good so... NOW for the price I was expecting thicker/ stiffer  material, maybe its pictured that way because its starched?? or does the model have on a petticoat?  I'm 5'3 , with a big booty and I can wear the dress alone, comes up right before the knees in the front and back. All covered. I'll still rocking it with tights and jeans though until its warmer. Beautiful dress! you will NOT regret it!
summary: I am in LOVE with Umgee

reviewText: Perfect Gift for Son He Loves it One real working watch One For Display.

Im a fan of Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood (and the manga) and a fan of pocket watches, I am very happy to find this great 2 pack deal of the State Alchemist watches. The watches themselves are much more beautiful in real life plus two different options of which I want to wear and how to wear, the black one I can wear in my pocket while the frosted silver one I can wear as a necklace. Im very pleased with my purchase and had great customer service from THOMPKINS.
Bought it as a gift and they love it!

He loved them

I really liked this item when it came, shiny, beautiful and well protected.  For my purpose (which is cosplaying) they are perfect! Though if you want a pocket watch that will work for day to day, wouldn't recommend it. The metal gets scuffed extremely easy and there are already visible scratches after only a few days,  of only having it in my pocket. Now if you want it for decoration,  it's perfect.

A good product,  just a little warning to those who expect to use it daily rather than just when they cosplay or need a bit of nerdy stuff for their outfit.
I just got mine was planning on giving them to my boys as christmas gifts but the dark one is plain. It has no markingings on it at all. Even the watch face is plain... Very unsatisfactory

My family loves Full Metal Alchemist. Both of my boys are fans. So this pocket watch set is a perfect gift item. This actually is two watches and my little guy is so excited to have his own Elric brother watch he screamed. They did an amazing job paying attention to the detail in these watches. All the way down to the remember engraving inside. These are well crafted. They are lightweight and not made of materials that will makes these watches heirlooms but they will hold up to daily use and last forever if only taken out for cosplaying. My oldest has now decided he shall be Edward Elric for Comic Con. This is a great start towards crafting his costume.

As watches, these keep time well. They came with batteries installed and the time is easy to set. I have been checking them all week and they do not drop time at all. You really cannot beat the price either.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: Wonderful for cos play or fans.

reviewText:

Shipping was extremely fast, and they came packaged in a small jewelry box separated by foam. The quality to detail on the watches, makes up for the cheaper material. My daughter definitely recommends them for any fan of the show.

reviewText: Happy young man.

I am a size 4, ordered a size large because I don't like tight clothing. Even the size large was a bit tight, but I have been able to wear all day without to much discomfort. They are soft and have good support.
I love these bras, but they don't have an incredibly long life--the fabric pills rather soon.  The fact that they can be had at such a great price helps indeed!
No boobs?  You're in luck.
I love these! So comfortable and they last a couple of years before they start to stretch out too much. I wash em' in a lingerie bag and hang to dry.

So, I really love these. But there were a few issues.
I am 34A, 5'6", 100lbs, with fairly wide-set breasts. These fit perfectly! They give me the shape I was going for, they stay put through all kinds of movement, while being probably the most comfortable bra I've ever had -- eventually. Nice and stretchy, but with good snap-back. Would fit larger breasts and band sizes, though I'm not sure how much larger.

The tag is incredibly itchy and irritating, so I removed that. But it was sewn on with a clear plastic thread that continued to scratch at me until I managed to remove that as well. It isn't just annoying, it rubbed skin off and gave me a small rash. Once gone, however, the bra feels wonderful to wear.

The padding in the cups is thicker and more stiff than I expected, which is a bummer. My boyfriend was hoping for softer on me, definitely. But they do give me a nice rounded shape without looking unnatural, and give my bust a bit of a boost without making them rock hard. Plus, these bras provide all the support I need.

I do wish the straps were further apart in the front, though. The plunge is JUST low enough to hide beneath most of my shirts, but the top of the cups show often. Too much front coverage is a common bra issue for me.

My biggest issue with these bras though, aside from the tag fiasco, is the packaging. They arrived bound together so tightly that the straps left permanent indentations in the cups! Being that I was going for seamless, this seriously bums me out. It isn't terribly noticeable, but it really irks me. Not enough not to wear them, I guess, but come on.

All in all, I am very glad I bought these. I am not kidding when I say they are unbelievably comfortable! I don't think I'll ever wear underwire again. These stay in place SOO much better, anyway.
Will be purchasing more!
These are my favorite. They even convert to racerback. Never going back to wires again.
I'm a fake 32c and these give great all day support and are very comfy. I like the v-neck so they stay hidden under lower cut necklines. The pads are thick enough to hide most cases of hard nipples.

The backpack is okay for a younger child but too small for a high school student!  Well made and my daughter liked the style but returned because couldn't fit more than one or two books/notebooks inside without concerns about tears or breaking zipper.

I wanted to love these. I'm a 34B and judging from the pictures (of obviously not small-chested models) and the positive reviews by other B-cup and even C-cup women I was assuming these would work fine. They are too small. I wanted wireless comfort, modesty pads, and a v-neckline to help avoid that sports bra shape. The "cup" of the bra doesn't cover as much width as a standard bra cup - as you can see in the side shots of the models. The unfortunate result of this for me was a double side-boob. Not very attractive. I ended up gifting them to my younger (and smaller) sisters. I'm going to guess that part of the issue could be that I'm not the same shape or *ahem* firmness that I used to be before nursing 2 babies. The search for the perfect bra continues...
summary: Not great for those larger than an A-cup...

I would recommend this bracelet. Both the problems that I had with it are easily fixable and are not that unexpected. I did receive this bracelet for free in exchange for my honest review. I am not a paid reviewer and opinions expressed are based solely on my personal experience.

reviewText:
I am a lover of all things retro. I pride myself in the ability to whip up some bad ass Victory Rolls a la Betty Grable!  Alas, being a mamma with two busy toddlers, doesnt quite go hand in hand with the time consuming preparation it takes to pull off an awesome vintage look. But,  with this hat I have found a muse to get me excited about curling and pinning once again! When I saw this fascinator it was love at first sight and I knew I could not live without it! The day it was delivered I immediately put it on and even though it was a lazy pajama day I wore it the rest of the night. It was an interesting look, sweats and a fancy gorgeous hat! Haha!
My girls were equally in love with this gem! I had to indulge them as well. Actually I didn't have a choice; they were begging me to try it on! They love playing dress up as much as I do!
As far as quality goes, I was not expecting much. A lot of the  fascinators Ive seen at the mall are just barely hot glued to a clip or headband and look like they were quickly thrown together with the cheapest materials available.
Happily, this fascinator could not be more different than those mall monstrosity's! The mesh used is thick and sturdy, all pearl and feather embellishments are staying put. Nothing looks or feels cheaply made. It is comfortable and light to wear; I almost forget I am wearing anything on my head!
With the Thanks Giving and Christmas Holidays so close I am excited to have an excuse to show off this gorgeous hat! (Do I really NEED and excuse??) I already have the perfect retro inspired dress and up do planned for Thanks Giving!!!
Oh, and Santa Baby, if you are listening, Ive been a REALLY good girl this year..I could really use another one..or twoor three of these sexy hats under the tree!
I reviewed this product at a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review.
Check out my You Tube review! https://youtu.be/jrnl1Y-7qpw
summary: Sexy Retro Hat is this Mamma's New Favorite!

reviewText: Nice medium weight Woolrich canvas slacks. Purchased these and two others in different colors. Finely detailed with rear pocket zipper and logo snap, cell phone pocket big enough to handle a Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime in silicon case. Prefer  this lighter weight to other similar cotton canvas slacks. Delighted to be able to find so much of the Woolrich label on Amazon, including goods from the Woolrich outlet store at real bargain prices.  Besides the slacks I have two Woolrich coats: a lighter parka and a much heavier denim jacket with wool lining,and a light jacket.  All of the clothes I have with the label are very well made. These slacks wash up well, and iron easily in a flash and keep the crease for a week if you are into stretching out the wardrobe or travelling. Look great with sweaters and more rustic outerwear and flannel shirts of course. Don't really wear sports coats any more, but would pair these with a sports coat, checked shirt and wool knit tie, penny loafers, sand boots or big clunky brown oxfords optional of course. I think that translates as: I would wear these to the office or out for an evening as well as hiking, weekend chores, lounging around at horse shows.
summary: Excellent  Easy to Maintain Medium Weight Cotton Canvas Slacks

reviewText:
The dress is adorable. The sizes available did not include a 10. I had to choose between an 8 and 12. My daughter wears a size 6 or 8 jeans, so a 10 in a dress would have been ideal. However, when the dress arrived it looked very small. We had her try it on by stepping into it. She could not get it on. So we took it off and put it on over her head. This way we were able to get it on and with a bit of moving and pulling we were able to get her zipped up and it fits great. However, I expected the size 12 to be much larger. We are going to buy Spanx top and bottom for her to wear under it to help it fit with a little bit of wiggle room. The dress quality is good. The lace on top is beautiful. My daughter is 5'9" and the skirt does lays nicely over her rear end. It is not too short even with her long torso and long legs. She is excited to wear it to the first dance in school. You can easily add a rhinestone belt/sash to dress this dress up even more. It is really an adorable and elegant dress and I'm glad it fit, even though it was much smaller than I expected it would be.

reviewText: Loved it

This dress fits great and feels fabulous. It is the perfect amount of fancy for a little black dress. Still classic but a bit of a flair for interest. I was initially concerned that it would be a bit see through but once on this is not a problem. The lace top is elegant and not itchy at all. Is a dense enough lace that it hides bra straps well yet still allows some skin to be seen. There is a fitted waist and then a slightly flared chiffon skirt. The skirt twirls and floats beautifully and feels so nice on. There is a zipper that goes down the back and it did not have any issues catching when I wore it. For me the zipper did not go down far enough to allow the dress to be pulled bottom up (wouldn't fit over my butt) however it went on top down perfectly and despite my initial fear that it wouldn't fit, it fit perfectly. I used their size chart and its a perfect fit. Love this dress and can't wait to wear it out and about.

Love this wallet clutch, has room for all my credit cards, money and other essentials such as makeup.

Wallet looks nice, and I hope that it works--I have no way of testing its RFID blocking feature, which is what I purchased it for. My main concern (assuming that it does block RFID) is that the credit card slots seem a bit large, and I'm worried that a credit card could fall out. Perhaps if you put multiple credit cards in one slot, this wouldn't be a problem. I do like that my iPhone 6+ fits easily in the zip-up portion of the wallet. I'd feel better about the credit card slots if they were also in the zipped portion, however.

I received this item at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. reviewText: I recently got this set of snaps and a bracelet and this was my first experience with "snap button" jewelry and I love it! I'm not a big jewelry person; I don't want to spend a ton of money on jewelry that I will only wear for special occasions. The snap bracelet is perfect because you can purchase several different snaps to customize one bracelet to match a million different outfits. This is a much more affordable option than buying individual bracelets for each occassion. The snaps I received are absolutely beautiful. I got 6 snaps and each design is really pretty and I can see myself wearing it. Not only that, but you can actually use these snaps for necklaces, and earrings. I got two of the same snap and now I feel I need the earrings so I can wear this set. The quality is great and I'm really excited to get more snaps! reviewText: Good quality!

Just like in shoes, don't ask, I have many, many belts and I'm a very picky buyer. I've read each and every customer reviews and although most of them were very informative, some of them were pure out and out dross! Yes, these are made in RED China. So what? They don't exactly make a secret of that fact, nor should they do so. These belts, IMO, are the best bang for the buck here on Planet Amazon. The coloration is spot-on, as  is the supple, thick and defect-free finish, including the hefty and quality finish on the buckle. You could easily pay two to three times as much for an equally comparable belt, EASILY! The only caveat to offer is that I wish they'd offer brass/gold(en) buckles on all of the colors that they offee  This cane coiled-up  and incased in a full length plastic sleeve inside of in nice little box. Making it perfect for gifting to that special someone. In closing, I buy "Made in America" if and whenever I can. But this isn't one if those times. Not when you're faced with serious quality and obvious pride in workmanship at 60's-70's pricing at this day and age. One additional caveat, go with the manufacturers sizing chart implicitly! I wear 33/34 pants and decided to with a large versus the manufacturers advised medium (23-34). The belt came with 6 notches, the usual industry standard of 5, and I'm using the furthest of the 6 notches. live and learn, as they say, as I will on my very next order of an additional two belts in different gorgeous colors. The leather itself is very soft and flexible which I don't think is a plus for a belt. The grain and finish of the belt look great, however, so no stars off for that. The backside of the belt is rough, unfinished leather, which makes it more difficult to put on and take off. I'm also not a big fan of the buckle itself, which is wrapped in leather at the back where it acts as a belt loop. The extra thickness makes the buckle protrude slightly on one side when the belt is worn. It looks a little sloppy to me.

This is a nice quality belt especially considering the cost, but size aside, I would not buy another one.

reviewText:
There's a lot to like about this belt, but I have one key complaint. Let's start off with the good: great color, soft pliable leather, and a nice buckle that compliments the leather. This belt is also easy to adjust, just unscrew the bolt, detach the buckle, cut off a little length, punch a new hole, and reassemble everything.
My complaint is that the screw and nut aren't great pieces of hardware. Both pieces of the chicago screw/sex bolt are too short. The ample thickness of the leather prevents the screw pieces from fully engaging, so only a handful of threads interlock. This caused my screw to strip, rendering the belt temporarily useless. Luckily the seller was easy to contact and they sent me six sets of chicago screws so I could find the best match. I picked a longer screw/nut combo (which allows more threads to engage), but I would still prefer them to be longer and fit together more tightly.

Overall though, I'm very happy with this belt so far. The new screw is holding up perfectly fine. The belt looks great and the easy/discrete length adjustment is a huge boon for someone with a 29" waist.
summary: Beautiful, adjustable belt. Could use a better screw/nut combo, but customer service was good

This is one of the cutest charms I've ever seen in my life.  I have a Pandora bracelet and, at first, I was a Pandora snob that would only put Pandora charms on my bracelet.  After a couple years I became bored with the variety of beads Pandora offered.  I wanted something different.  Enter my addiction to Soufeel.  One night I was searching Amazon for charms and found the Soufeel pink travel car charm and the travel trailer charm.  I thought they would look adorable on my Pandora bangle for the summer (since I LOVE camping so much)!  When they were delivered I was in love.  I was impressed with the quality of Soufeel.  So, I went over to the Soufeel website to check out their complete line of charms, bracelets, rings and earrings.  Wow!  Such a variety!  I fell in love with the Snail Charm as soon as I laid eyes on it.  I immediately purchased it and couldn't wait for it to be delivered.  It is now one of my absolute favorite charms.  The quality is comparable to Pandora.  The swarovski crystal elements are perfectly placed and the sparkle is gorgeous.  I love the cute little black eyes on the snail, too!  It is SO cute.  The size of the charm is every so slightly bigger than that of my Pandora beads.  The best way to describe it is to look at any of your Pandora ball or spherical clip beads.  That is the size of the shell on this snail.  Now add his little body to that.  And you've got a slightly larger charm.  My Pandora bracelet is all silver charms and Pandora rose gold charms.  This little snail charm fits in beautifully with the rose gold charms.  I would not hesitate for one minute to recommend this charm to anyone looking to add a gorgeous charm to their Pandora bracelet at a FRACTION of the cost of a comparable Pandora charm.  I now own over 10 Soufeel charms and I can honestly say I love every single one of them.  The quality is comparable- the price is INCREDIBLE!
summary: Love, love, love.  Did I mention I love this little guy?

reviewText: Read the size chart very carefully. I am a 38D and size 14 in pants and the size 52 fits me perfect. The top is supportive without looking too conservative (which is usually a problem for someone with large breasts and in need of support). The bottoms fit me very well, the cut suits me because it is higher than a traditional bikini bottom but does not come above my belly button. It should be noted that on the bottoms the two tone look is only present on the front. The back is the lighter blue color throughout which I don't prefer but the fit and quality of the top outweighs a slight difference of style. Overall it's perfect for the fit on me!
summary: I am a 38D and size 14 in pants and the size 52 fits me perfect. The top is supportive without looking too conservative ...

reviewText: Too small I returned it

If you follow the size directions then you should be able to find your ideal fit. This suit is really vibrant in person and fits nicely. I ordered this suit mainly for the top. I suspected the bottoms weren't truly high-waisted, which was true. They fit me more like large briefs. I'm not comfortable wearing the bottoms at this point since they point of high-waisted for me is to cover up the extra tummy. I'm pairing the top with a black high-waisted bottom. I usually wear a 12 or 14 and size large and ordered 4XL in this suit.

Edited: I didn't realize when I originally tried on this suit that the top didn't fit me properly. Tried it on again today and I think I ordered the wrong size. I think a 3XL would have been a better fit for me. Really disappointed because it's super cute!
summary: This suit is really vibrant in person and fits nicely. I ordered this suit mainly for the top

Really really wanted to like this dress but it had some issues I just can't get past. The top white portion is so uncomfortable because you can feel the heavy flowery designs, the underside of it is like iron on patches which dig into your skin because there's nothing in between to cushion it. The flower pattern that hangs down onto the blue skirt portion is not even attached to the dress completely. They kind of dangle oddly and are so uneven they bring down the quality look of the dress. The only thing I really liked was the color which was a beautiful vibrant blue, hence the 2 stars. The complaints I have can be adjusted to, wear a slip under, make sure the flowers are smoothed down, etc. but I like items I purchase to be perfect without having to adjust too much. Will be returning. Oh, I ordered the 5XL which is equivalent to XL in U.S. Sizing.

I honestly thought we would end up returning it because it looked very short in the picture and was concerned about other reviewers stating it runs large and it might end up being too big.

The corset-like in the back is adjustable. It gives you wiggle room to make it snugger or loosen it up if needed and holds its shape in the front very well. It is a very good thing since the shoulder strap is mostly there for decoration.

The package it arrived in is very small, an envelope actually, and when I saw it last night I was doubtful that it would be a decent looking dress, but this morning, she tried it on and she looks amazing.

We find the dress is very good quality and the price is affordable and the style something that is fitting for different occasions, not just the prom, so if she can get more mileage out of this dress in the future, it is totally worth it.
